event.titlec: 《X聖治》─ 影評人之選2017
event.descc: 命案一一發生，死者的頸部都有「X」型的傷痕。案發前，行兇者的生活都看似幸福，沒有殺人動機，但都清楚知道自己殺人的行為。刑警高部賢一負責調查案件的同時，亦要面對有失憶精神問題的愛妻，背負雙重壓力。調查指向一名自稱失憶的青年間宮邦彥，涉案者犯案前皆曾與他接觸。二人與間宮接觸後，高部和他的心理學家朋友佐間久與間宮接觸後，讓他們愈來愈接近案件的真相，但卻同時逐步墮入精神異常的邊緣狀態。黑澤清將都市壓力透過催眠傳換擴大，為影片鋪奠了神秘、冷峻的調色。
event.desce: The city is struck by serial homicide in which all victims have X-shaped neck wounds. Before committing the murders, each murderer is leading a happy life and no motive can be established, yet each of them is fully conscious on the atrocious acts they’ve done. Detective Takabe is assigned to the case but he is under extra pressure because his wife has a neurotic amnesia condition. All traces point to Mamiya, a young man who claims to be amnesiac. He is the only common link among the murderers. Takabe takes his psychologist buddy Sakuma to see Mamiya, but after the encounter, Takabe and Sakuma gradually lose their grip and sink into an isolated mental edge, despite getting nearer to the secret behind the homicides. Kiyoshi Kurosawa transforms and expands the stress of city life by way of hypnosis, resulting in a mysterious but chilly tone of this film that shoots Kurosawa into worldwide fame.
event.remarkc: 2017年12月10日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：吳月華 及2017年12月17日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：尹婉萍（註冊社工，精於催眠治療）、 吳月華

event.titlec: 「點只旗杆屋咁簡單」導賞系列 - 遊古蹟 · 賞本土陶瓷導賞團 (粵語/英語/普通話)
event.titlee: "Getting to Know More About Flagstaff House" Docent Series - Visit our Heritage & Appreciate Local Ceramics Docent Tour (Cantonese/English/Putonghua)
event.descc: 昔日的旗杆屋是香港三軍司令官邸，今天它卻是一所展示茶具、石刻、古物等的博物館，充滿著中國文化藝術氛圍。您對旗干屋好奇嗎? 您對中國藝術有興趣嗎?導賞員會透過一系列的活動，讓您認識杆屋的演變，還帶您欣賞珍貴的瑰寶。請隨心意，選擇您的導賞之旅，讓一家大小渡過一個難忘的週日!
event.desce: Flagstaff House in the old days was the office and residence of the Commander of British Forces in Hong Kong. Today, it is a museum full of Chinese art and cultural atmosphere where tea ware, seal carving, artefact etc. are on display. Do you want to know more about the Flagstaff House? Are you interested in Chinese art? Our museum docents will tell you the development of Flagstaff House and bring you to see the treasures through this series of tour. Just pick your own choice and share your family with an unforgettable weekend！
event.remarke: Putonghua: 2017.10.29 ∣ 11.26 (Sun) 11:00am - 12:00nn,English: 2017.10.29 ∣ 11.26 (Sun) 3:00 – 4:00pm,Flagstaff House Museum of Tea Ware (G/F),12 seats per session, please call 2869 0690 for reservation
event.presenterorgc: 茶具文物館
event.presenterorge: Flagstaff House Museum of Tea Ware

event.titlec: 《下一秒我就憎你》
event.agelimitc: 適合6歲或以上人士觀看
event.descc: 《下一秒我就憎你》 Hate You in A Second 繼《小人國6》《開關係》《男男女女男》 W創作社 「全員憎恨 以恨說愛」 Ｗ創作社 X 梁祖堯 X 邵美君 X 湯駿業 X 白只 X 韋羅莎 愛與不愛，兩邊也是死路！情緒即將爆發... 有沒有想過：恨也可以是一種互相牽引的關係……有時候甚至比愛更加深刻！ 而且，真正的愛也會包含「憎恨」？所謂的愛，有時候就是包容對方的缺點、忍受互相的折磨？ W創作社繼《小人國6》《開關係》《男男女女男》，再次打破常規，以恨說愛！ 《下一秒我就憎你》由黃智龍執導、黃智龍與小說家月巴氏合編，演員梁祖堯、邵美君、湯駿業、白只、韋羅莎、鄧世昌及梁嘉進...全員憎恨！各有各的憎恨對象和原因！將於12月1日起在葵青劇院演藝廳公演！ 粵語演出
event.desce: “Hate You In A Second” is the latest drama production by W Theatre, directed by Wong Chi-lung, co-written by Wong Chi-lung and Fat Moon Ba, starring Joey Leung, Shaw Mei-Kwan, Edmond Tong, Michael Ning and Rosa Velasco. In Cantonese
event.presenterorgc: W創作社主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by W Theatre

event.titlec: 《女巫》─ 影評人之選2017
event.descc: 這部默片經典，運用冷靜的態度、豐富的論述、怪誕的影像，詮釋中世紀巫術和女巫故事，曖昧神秘不下於其題材。丹麥電影大師基斯登遜以創新著稱，此片即混合紀錄和劇情多樣形式。導演第一身敘述，聲明為文化歷史探索之作。用圖像模型追溯人類迷信，重演各式獵巫個案，有詼諧和無知的浮世繪，有狂熱和恐懼造成的奇情冤案。宗教法庭殘酷逼供據實展現，被控者告白化為影像，魔鬼淫亂煉術，觸目驚心。最後用現代科學解釋，女巫或為心理病患，但弱者處境古今何異？影片洋洋大觀，光怪陸離，理性的框架充滿肆意的想像，恍如神秘學文獻，被譽為超現實主義電影先鋒作，面世近百年來，顛覆和趣味依然獨到。今次特別獻映瑞典電影資料館2017年修復版本。
event.desce: This silent film classic uses a sense of composure, rich narratives, and grotesque visuals to interpret stories of mediaeval witchcrafts and witches,presenting a mystic ambiguity no less than the subject matter itself. Danish film master Benjamin Christensen was known for his innovation, as proven by Häxan’s hybrid form of dramadocumentary, and its cultural and historical exploration as declared through the director’s own narration. With graphics and models the film studies superstition through re-enacting different examples of witch-hunts that were ukiyo-e of humour and ignorance, or bizarre cases of injustice caused by fanaticism andfear. Authentic depiction of religious authorities’ torturous interrogation, confession by the accused and devilish witches’ sabbath rituals are all too shocking and dreadful to bear. The film finalizes with modern science to interpret acts of witchcraft as mental illness. Has the plight of the socially weak ever changed now andthen? A spectacular panorama of peculiarity and bold imagination built under a rational framework as if a piece of occultism literature, the film is regarded as a pioneer in surrealist cinema, which is still subversive and unique as it was released almost a century ago. The Swedish Film Institute 2017 restored edition will be used for the screening programme.

event.titlec: 《雙妹嘜魔幻迷你聖誕》─ 聖誕電影合家歡2017
event.titlee: "Jill and Joy’s Winter" - Christmas Family Screen 2017
event.descc: 你有否想像過《大人國與小人國》的情節發生在你身上？聖誕將至，一架如鞋盒般細小的汽車來到雙妹嘜珍兒和彩伊的家門前，從車裏走出來的是一個無家可歸的迷你家庭！兩位女孩邀請他們到家中暫住，可是有些大人卻對迷你訪客心懷不軌。幸好，在魔法師鄰居和正義警長夫婦幫忙下，她們展開了難忘的歷險，更與迷你家庭共度一個魔幻的小小聖誕派對！
event.desce: What would you do if some cutey mini-sized humans come knock on your door at Christmas time? One December evening, a shoebox-sized car pulls up in front of Jill and Joy’s house. Stepping out is the teensy-weensy McTinies family, who has become homeless. The girls invite them to stay temporarily, but soon find out not all big people have good intentions towards the tiny. Fortunately, with the help of their neighbours who are capable of all kinds of magical things, plus the Police Chief and his wife, Jill and Joy have an adventure with a happy ending and get to spend a magical tiny Christmas party.
event.remarkc: 現場粵語配音，英文字幕
event.remarke: Live Cantonese dubbing with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《萬世魔星》─ 影評人之選2017
event.agelimitc: 只准18歲或以上人士觀看
event.descc: 拜恩與耶穌同年同月同日同地，在相鄰的馬槽出生，東方三博士也差點把他當作聖嬰來朝拜……雖有這一切巧合，拜恩依然長成一個平平無奇的猶太青年，在母親與羅馬帝國的威權下苟活，直到他在耶穌登山講道的集會上遇到「猶太人民陣線」的志士，生命才出現轉機。為了巴勒斯坦的自由，更為博紅顏一笑，拜恩步上彌賽亞的道路。英國踎低噴飯劇團打造，一枚充滿聖經傳說、神秘宗教、政治陰謀、天外來客，熱血與正能量極度滿瀉的超級笑蛋。
event.desce: Brian is born on the same day as Jesus Christ, and just one manger away. The Three Magi nearly confuse Brian with the real Saviour... With such special background Brian grows up to be...an ordinary Jewish young man. Just like all Jews at the time Brian lives under the authoritarian rule of the Romans. Brian would have lived a most ordinary life until he runs into members of the People’s Front of Judea during the Sermon on the Mount. For the freedom of Palestine, and for the girl he adores, Brian takes up the path of the Messiah. Produced and performed by Monty Python, Life of Brian is a full bag of hilarious bitspoking fun at the Bible, political conspiracies, extraterrestrials and positivity.
event.remarkc: 2017年12月16日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：顏志良（宣教師）、 鄭傳鍏

event.titlec: 《雪山男孩的奇妙旅程》─ 聖誕電影合家歡2017
event.descc: 當我們慶祝聖誕節時，一個住在瑞士阿爾卑斯山的小男孩卻準備慶祝「趕雪節」。這是山上的習俗，由小孩們敲響鈴鐺，送走寒冬，迎接春天。但在歡度佳節之前，小男孩一家失去了用來賺錢過冬的收成，他要把心愛的山羊轉讓村中小惡霸，而他的鈴鐺更是所有孩子中最細小的。樂觀的他決定靠自己，幫助家人渡過難關，並到山頂去尋找最大的鈴鐺，冒險之旅正式展開！
event.desce: We celebrate Christmas at the end of winter. But for Ursli, a mountain boy who lives up in the Swiss Alps, his village celebrates Chalandamarz. It is a mountain ritual for which the kids chime the bells to say goodbye to winter and welcome spring. However, this is a difficult winter for Ursli as his family lose their harvest in an accident, and he has to give up his beloved pet goat. And as if things could not get any worse, Ursli receives the smallest bell of all kids. So he decides to take matters in his own hands, to help his parents and to find the biggest bell, which is hidden in a cabin on top of the mountain. The adventure is on!
event.remarkc: 瑞士德語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In Swiss German with Chinese and English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「新能量」系列：方外無式《剎那》
event.titlee: "New Energy" Series: KO The Box - "Killing Time"
event.predateC: 2017年12月15日至16日 (星期五至六) 晚上8:00 2017年12月16日至17日 (星期六至日) 下午3:00
event.progtimec: 演出全長約1小時30分鐘，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The running time of the performance is approximately 1 hour and 30 minutes without intermission.
event.descc: 粵語演出 一步        就能過去 救不了生命的救生員， 嫁不到新郎的準新娘…… 從都巿中人來人往的身影， 探索每個生命不同的瞬間。 人面對生命中最大的恐懼， 到底該吸口氣繼續， 還是應呼口氣結束？ 概念創作／聯合編導：張學良 聯合編劇：阮韻珊 聯合導演：陳焯威 演員：巢嘉倫、陳秄沁、薛海暉、阮煒楹、高棋炘
event.desce: In Cantonese One step...and everything will be fine. Searching through the city, Looking into different moments of different stories, Standing in front of life's biggest fear, Should one take a deep breath and go on, Or should one take a step to end everything?
event.remarkc: 遲到者須待節目適當時候方可進場。
event.remarke: Latecomers will only be admitted at a suitable break.

方外無式主辦

event.titlec: 《食襪怪歷險記》─ 聖誕電影合家歡2017
event.descc: 襪子總是不翼而飛？原來是「食襪怪」作怪！他們隱身於人類之間，專食臭襪，原則是只會吃掉每對襪子中的其中一隻。雨果是一隻小小的食襪怪，他要離開祖父，尋找叔叔和兩個表哥。過程中他遇上想捉拿食襪怪的古怪博士，以及會偷走整對襪子的害群之馬！但他從祖父的教誨中獲得無比勇氣，憑著對家人的愛、良好的品格和遵守食襪怪的十誡，面對新環境和挑戰。
event.desce: Wondering why your socks always go missing? It’s the Oddsockeaters! They are small invisible creatures, who live alongside humans and they eat socks, but only one from each pair. Hugo is a small oddsockeater in a big world. He has to leave his dying grandpa and to find his uncle Big Boss and two crazy cousins, who live in the house of their biggest adversary, a lonely professor. Hugo also meets the gangsters who steal full pairs of socks! Despite all the dangers, he draws his courage from what his grandpa taught him – love toward family, good manners and the Oddsockeaters’ ten commandments, and win challenges in the new environment.
event.remarkc: 捷克語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In Czech with Chinese and English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《胡桃夾奇兵》─ 聖誕電影合家歡2017
event.descc: 聖誕前夕，瑪莉和費殊的乾爸爸送了一個胡桃夾子給他們作聖誕禮物，晚上瑪莉竟看到由胡桃夾子率領的英勇大軍，與邪惡老鼠王的兵團決戰！瑪莉和費殊兩姐弟闖進玩具王國，協助胡桃夾子對抗壞蛋，過程中他們上了寶貴的一課，明白到兄弟姊妹互相幫助，相親相愛，才是世上最珍貴的禮物！
event.desce: On Christmas Eve, Marie and Fritz’s godfather gives them an early Christmas gift, a Nutcracker. Soon after, Marie witnesses a great battle between a vast army of toy soldiers led by the Nutcracker against a terrible platoon of mice commanded by the Mouse King. It’s a toy-story-comes-true for the kids as they embark on a wonderful journey in the Kingdom of Dolls. As the adventure continues, Marie and Fritz learn a great lesson that siblings are the best gift on earth, and they should treat each other sweetly with kindness and love.

event.titlec: 《「神秘學電影」工作坊：第二節：陰謀論與西方流行電影》─ 影評人之選2017
event.titlee: "Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 2: Conspiracy Theories in Western Popular Cinema" - Critics' Choice 2017
event.descc: 電影的誕生，是為了負起宣揚神秘學的命運。這話怎理解？換個說法吧：電影發明者中，不乏共濟會人，當中有人同流有人逆行；這是陰謀論的「知情人」（Insider）的解密角度。那麼從共濟會西歐的發源地一帶去找佐證，威瑪時期的《大都會》（Metropolis，1927）、《浮士德》（Faust，1926）你不會看漏眼吧，是時候在傳統分類裏，揣摩神秘學電影傘子下的陰謀論電影。陰謀論電影潮可以說是二十世紀六十年代的反制思潮激發，藉政治驚慄元素擴散。時間跳躍來到當下，目下所有超級英雄片都討論制度背後目的和操作，小至企業犯罪，中至新世界秩序建立，大至消滅地球，全是陰謀。陰謀論者利用流行影像洗人腦，你不可不識。
event.desce: "Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 2: Conspiracy Theories in Western Popular Cinema " - Critics' Choice 2017 (Speaker: Lam Kee-to, Bryan Chang)
event.remarkc: 粵語主講
event.remarke: Conducted in Chinese
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《「神秘學電影」工作坊：第三節：時空光影內探》─ 影評人之選2017
event.titlee: "Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 3: Into Fascinating Spaces" - Critics' Choice 2017
event.descc: 電影是2維科藝，3維視覺，和＋3多維的想像，空間因着人的意識而建立，並且生長，而電影令種種視覺憧憬變成真實「存在」。早於美術特技不發達的黑白片時代，《西藏桃源》（Lost Horizon，1937）以大自然景色為香巴拉美境留下印記，自此一路走來，時間及空間的界域不斷以菲林於外在建設，並慢慢結合意識發展為內世界體現。《2001太空漫遊》結局的白室孤獨「自在」是里程碑。進入電腦特技年代，幾何的生命訊息體，到量子海的活宇宙空間感知，只在當代電影獨家放送。
event.desce: "Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 3: Into Fascinating Spaces" - Critics' Choice 2017 (Speaker: Lam Kee-to, Bryan Chang, Leung kam-cheung)
event.remarkc: 粵語主講
event.remarke: Conducted in Chinese
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《「神秘學電影」工作坊：第四節：非西方神秘經驗》─ 影評人之選2017
event.titlee: "Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 4: Non-Western Mysticism" - Critics' Choice 2017
event.descc: 走出理性主義抬頭的西方，向東，也向南，來到亞洲諸土，亦可踏足人類發源地的非洲，處處是不一樣的秘境。日本的動畫電影順着科幻的腳印走，走出獨特新天地，幾時都在問：我們這個民族從哪裏來，又往哪裏去？伊朗片總在寫實與詩意之間發掘蘇菲（Sufi）魔術時刻。印度寶萊塢因歌舞之名，空間來去自如，說穿了還是謹守奉神之道。佛國的靈眼，泰國片看到隔世時空裏緣份交感。還有印尼片舞蹈之神、香港片奇武世俗，及非洲的巫靈文化……都是電影反映民族信仰，和地緣神秘命脈。
event.desce: "Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 4: Non-Western Mysticism" - Critics' Choice 2017 (Speaker: Lam Kee-to, Bryan Chang, MC Yan)
event.remarkc: 粵語主講
event.remarke: Conducted in Chinese
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《「神秘學電影」工作坊：第五節：電影情報學》─ 影評人之選2017
event.titlee: "Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 5: Information Science in Cinema" - Critics' Choice 2017
event.descc: 情報學一詞源起於二次大戰時，目前最受日本民間學術界追捧，他們認為目前全球文明建基於謊言，需要自覺有系統地發展一套檢視世界的情報、編輯及推敲真相的日常工具。電影以象徵、符號、密碼去發言，神秘訊息並非無的放矢，是一個「被承認」的發放場。不要以為看着的是改編幾十年前的漫畫世界，其實充滿指向當下的情報，英國脫歐、特朗普當選，以至延續討論任何神秘學議題，有心人早發現了。「知情人」不會停步解釋，你要跟上來，建立你自己的分析網絡。影迷是不是神秘學迷都好，面紗總要自行掀起。
event.desce: "Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 5: Information Science in Cinema" - Critics' Choice 2017 (Speaker: Lam Kee-to, Bryan Chang)
event.remarkc: 粵語主講
event.remarke: Conducted in Chinese
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《靈光》─ 影評人之選2017
event.descc: 影片一開始，權力薰心的西非大法師Soma宰羊祭天，誓言要殺死素未謀面的親兒子Nianankoro，帶着法力無邊的空睿之翼權杖和空龍令牌出發。Nianankoro唯有離開相依為命的母親，往遠方求助伯父，路途上幾番折騰墮入生死邊緣，憑着率性，加上水靈護身，天命成長發光發熱。蘇里曼薛斯將十三世紀馬里帝國的民間傳說，結合班巴拉族地的空莫秘社文化，探討人間永恆的父子情仇，亦以地水風火交集烘托循環於天地的神隱力。結局光有翼、兩蛋共息，寫照宇宙二元重生再來，散發非洲電影非線性敘事的獨特史詩魅力。
event.desce: Yeelen begins with the wizard Soma making a sacrifice, vowing to kill his own son Nianankoro. Soma then sets off with his powerful Kore’s Wing and Kolonkalanni Tablet. To escape this father who has never met him, Nianankoro leaves his mother and seeks help from his uncle. Nianankoro has several dangerous moments but he overcomes them with his tenacity and the protection of the water spirit. Souleymane Cissé takes a 13th century Mali myth and infuses it with elements of the sectarian cultures of Bambaraand Komo. Yeelen is also about the eternal father-and-son struggle and the inexplicable power of the elements. Light becomes winged,the two eggs come to a rest and the universe is reborn. Yeelen is a mesmerizing example of the non-linearity of African cinema.
event.remarkc: 2018年1月20日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：陸叔遠（資深電影美術指導）、張偉雄2018年1月21日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：張偉雄
event.remarke: Post-screening seminar with Robert Loh (Veteran Art Director in Film) and Bryan Chang in Cantonese on 20 Jan 2018 andPost-screening seminar with Bryan Chang in Cantonese on 21 Jan 2018
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: #藝術旅人展覽系列二：回憶探索
event.titlee: #ArtTravellers Exhibition Series II: Revisiting Memory Lane
event.descc: 展覽邀請兩位以不同媒介創作的本地藝術家 — 劉學成和陳的，藉著他們的作品展示其在異地的探險精神，追溯似曾相識的故地舊物，無論是在旅途中尋找未知的歷史文化，還是遊走已消失的回憶或印象，都是一場心靈的探索之旅。
event.desce: The exhibition features Hanison Lau and Chan Dick, two creative artists working in two different media, and follows their soulful explorations and adventures in which they look at unknown histories and cultures, or revisit snippets that are lost in memory.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「開懷集」系列: 香港城市室樂團 - 絃韻法蘭明高
event.titlee: 'Cheers!' Series :Sinfonia Flamenca by City Chamber Orchestra of Hong Kong
event.predateC: 2017年12月10日 (星期日) 晚上7時30分
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時40分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 40 minutes, including a 15 minute intermission.
event.descc: 在法蘭明高音樂世界裡，胡安．卡爾蒙拿是聲譽顯赫的人物，曾四度獲提名拉丁格林美獎。他所創作的《絃韻法蘭明高》，把充滿異國風情的安達盧西亞樂與西方古典樂融合，在一首樂曲中將法蘭明高結他與歌舞和管弦樂熱情交融，由此開創了一個新樂風。眾位樂迷可別錯過！
event.desce: One of the most esteemed figures in the world of Flamenco and a four-time Latin Grammy Nominee, Juan Carmona is the creator of Sinfonia Flamenca, a ground-breaking work that mixes the exotic world of Andalusia with the classics. Come experience the passionate cross-section of Flamenco guitar, voice, dance and orchestra like you never heard it before!
event.presenterorgc: 香港城市室樂團主辦；鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署
event.presenterorge: Presented by City Chamber Orchestra of Hong Kong; Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「開懷集」系列: 香港城市室樂團—《雪人》與《大熊》
event.titlee: 'Cheers!' Series :The Snowman & The Bear by City Chamber Orchestra of Hong Kong
event.predateC: 2017年12月17日 (星期日) 下午4時30分及晚上7時30分
event.progtimec: 每場演出長約1小時20分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘。
event.progtimee: Each performance will run for about 1 hour and 20 minutes including a 15 minute intermission.
event.descc: 齊來與《雪人》與《大熊》一起慶祝聖誕！這兩套可愛感人的動畫，源自雷蒙‧碧斯膾炙人口的故事，並將透過大銀幕播放，配以旁白、獻唱及香港城市室樂團現場演奏，趣味盎然，讓一家大小歡度佳節！
event.desce: Celebrate the Christmas season with Howard Blake’s The Snowman & The Bear! Heartwarming and magical, these two animated films are based on the books by Raymond Briggs. Experience them on the big screen with live orchestral accompaniment and singing. The perfect Christmas treat for all the family!

event.predateC: 2017年12月10日 (星期日) 下午3時至5時
event.remarkc: 憑票免費入場，座位有限，先到先得，額滿即止。索取門票方法： 1) 演出舉行前一個月於香港文化中心(尖沙咀梳士巴利道10號)及香港大會堂(中環愛丁堡廣場5號)地下詢問處派發；2) 將姓名、手提電話、欲索取門票數量(每人最多索取4張)資料，電郵至info@ttmhk.hk 留座，請於活動當日節目開始前十五分鐘，親臨演出場地領取門票 (憑姓名及手提電話號碼取票)。
event.remarke: Tickets are required for the performance. Limited free tickets can be obtained on a first-come-first-served basis as follows:Collection of Free Tickets1) In person: Tickets will be distributed one month prior to the performance at the enquiry counter of Hong Kong Cultural Centre (10 Salisbury Road, Tsim Sha Tsui) and Hong Kong City Hall (5 Edinburgh Place, Central);2) By email: Send your name, mobile phone number and number of ticket required (maximum 4 tickets per person) to info@ttmhk.hk for reservation and collect the ticket 15 minutes before the performance at venue on the day of the performance.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlee: 2017 Community Cultural Ambassador -Hua Xia Chinese Music Association "Chinese Music Wave" Touring Concert cum Exhibition
event.descc: 邀請本地一班青年演奏家及華夏青年中樂團精英講解及示範不同種類樂器，演奏重新編寫的經典樂曲，引發普羅眾對中樂的興趣，每場均設展示樂器模型的展覽，豐富觀眾對中樂的認識。

event.titlec: 2017社區文化大使計劃 - 竹韻小集「茶韻和風」講座《茶馬古道音樂行》
event.titlee: 2017 Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme- Windpipe Chinese Music Ensemble "The Rhymes of Tea" Lecture on A Musical Walk along the Tea Horse Road
event.descc: 講者曾在雲南生活了十五個春秋，對茶馬古道上各民族音樂深入了解，更創作了大量西南少數民族素材音樂作品。講座將會分享茶馬古道上各民族音樂特色以及講者在雲南工作的苦與樂。

event.titlec: 2017社區文化大使計劃 - 竹韻小集「茶韻和風」工作坊《茶馬古道葫蘆絲》
event.titlee: 2017 Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme- Windpipe Chinese Music Ensemble "The Rhymes of Tea" Tea Horse Road and Hulusi Workshop
event.descc: 工作坊以葫蘆絲讓學員掌握正確吹管樂器演奏方法，學員將可安排於社區音樂會中演出，總結和分享學習成果。
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化處事務署(觀眾拓展)-藝術節及娛樂事務組-觀眾拓展辦事處主辦

event.titlec: 2017社區文化大使計劃 - 竹韻小集「茶韻和風」工作坊《春夏秋冬茶與樂》
event.titlee: 2017 Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme- Windpipe Chinese Music Ensemble "The Rhymes of Tea" The Four Seasons with Tea and Music Workshop
event.descc: 工作坊「以茶映樂，以樂顯茶」，在對應的樂曲的播放下，由專業茶人指導該茶的正確泡茶方法，及了解如何健康飲茶。
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化處事務署(觀眾拓展)-藝術節及娛樂事務組-觀眾拓展辦事處主辦

event.titlec: 2017社區文化大使計劃 - 竹韻小集「茶韻和風」巡迴音樂會《茶是故鄉濃》
event.titlee: 2017 Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme- Windpipe Chinese Music Ensemble "The Rhymes of Tea" Touring Concert
event.pricee: Free admission. No ticket is required.
event.descc: 在資深茶人的專業介紹下，認識白、紅、黃、黑、綠、青六大茶類特色，並精選了十二種名茶產地的民歌與小品現場演奏，部份樂曲更以「茶」為主題，透過獨奏和合奏組合，了解各種樂器的特性。

event.titlec: 2017/18 戲棚粵劇齊齊賞
event.titlee: 2017/18 Let’s Enjoy Cantonese Opera in Bamboo Theatre
event.descc: 康樂及文化事務署獲沙田大圍村十年一屆太平清醮2017丁酉年建醮委員會、石澳居民會有限公司及大埔舊墟天后宮社區活動管理委員會支持，在別具特色的戲棚舉辦「戲棚粵劇齊齊賞」，上演適合學生觀看的粵劇折子戲《獅子樓》及《三打白骨精》，並有親子互動環節供觀眾參與，讓市民特別是學生有機會通過活動踏足戲棚，在認識戲棚這種獨特的臨時建築之餘，同時欣賞粵劇，使中國傳統文化藝術得以薪火相傳。為方便觀眾欣賞演出，粵劇折子戲演出將設有中英文字幕。
event.desce: “Let’s Enjoy Cantonese Opera in Bamboo Theatre” is organised by the Leisure and Cultural Services Department with the support from the Organising Committee of 2017 Da Jiu Festival of the Shatin Tai Wai Village, Shek O Residents Association Limited and Tai Po Old Market Tin Hau Temple Social Event Control Committee. In this programme, Cantonese opera excerpts for students, including “Vengeance at the Lion Pavilion” and “The Monkey King Thrice Beats the Bony Ghost”, are performed at distinctive bamboo theatres in three different districts, and parent-child interactive activities are organised for the audience. The aim of this programme is to provide the public, in particular students, with opportunities to set foot on bamboo theatres to learn more about this unique kind of temporary structure and to appreciate Cantonese operas, thereby enabling inheritance of traditional Chinese culture and arts from generation to generation.
event.remarkc: 免費入場券先到先得，額滿即止。索取方法（每人每場限取4張）：1. 郵寄索取：請附上已貼有足資郵票的回郵信封，郵寄至香港灣仔愛群道18號伊利沙伯體育館11樓康文署觀眾拓展辦事處收。信封面請註明『索取「戲棚粵劇齊齊賞」門票』、活動日期、時間及數量，並請提供姓名及聯絡電話。 2. 親身索取：免費入場券將於30.10.2017起於以下地點派發：a) 香港文化中心大堂詢問處(地址：九龍尖沙咀梳士巴利道十號)（派發時間︰星期一至日9am-9pm） b) 香港大會堂低座大堂詢問處 (地址：香港中環愛丁堡廣場五號)（派發時間︰星期一至日9am-9pm）c) 沙田大會堂詢問處（地址：香港新界沙田源禾路一號）(派發時間：星期一至日9am-9pm）d) 沙田民政諮詢中心（地址：新界沙田上禾輋路1號沙田政府合署地下） (派發時間：星期一至五（公眾假期除外）9am-7pm）
event.remarke: Free tickets are distributed on a first-come-first-served basis (each person may get a maximum of 4 tickets for each performance) through: 1. By MailPlease send a stamped self-addressed envelope to: Audience Building Office, LCSD 11th Floor, Queen Elizabeth Stadium, 18 Oi Kwan Road, Wanchai, Hong KongPlease mark ‘Request for free ticket of “Let’s Enjoy Cantonese Opera in Bamboo Theatre”’on the envelope and indicate performance date, time, number of ticket, your name and contact no. 2. Obtain In PersonFree tickets will also be distributed at the following venues from 30.10.2017: i) Enquiry counter at the foyer of Hong Kong Cultural Centre(Address: 10 Salisbury Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong) (Time of Distribution: Monday to Sunday, 9am - 9pm) ii) Enquiry counter at the foyer of Hong Kong City Hall Low Block (Address: 5 Edinburgh Place, Central, Hong Kong)(Time of Distribution: Monday to Sunday, 9am - 9pm) iii) Enquiry Counter of Sha Tin Town Hall (Address: 1 Yuen Wo Road, Sha Tin, N.T.) (Time of Distribution: Monday to Sunday, 9am - 9pm)iv) Sha Tin Home Affairs Enquiry Centre (Address: G/F., Sha Tin Government Offices, 1 Sheung Wo Che Road, Sha Tin, N.T.) (Time of Distribution: Monday to Friday (Except Public Holidays), 9am - 7pm)

event.titlec: 立體電影《與星同源3D》
event.descc: 立體球幕電影《與星同源3D》嘗試解答一些最根本的問題：「我們是由甚麼構成？」，以及「萬物從何而來？」。節目亦會探索奇妙的宇宙化學，我們如何從一場爆炸而來，還有生命和宇宙演化的關係。齊來參與這次精彩旅程吧。
event.desce: The 3D Dome Show "We Are Stars 3D" seeks to answer some of the biggest questions of all time. What are we made of? Where did it all come from? The show also explores the secrets of our cosmic chemistry, our explosive origins and connects life on Earth to the evolution of the Universe. Come and be amazed.

event.titlec: 香港舞蹈總會《緣起敦煌》
event.titlee: Dunhuang Reflections by Hong Kong Dance Federation
event.predateC: 2017年12月22至23日 (五至六) 晚上8時 2017年12月24日 (日) 下午3時
event.agelimitc: 歡迎年滿6歲的觀眾入場。
event.agelimite: Audiences aged 6 and above are welcome.
event.descc: 香港舞蹈總會為響應一帶一路的文化建設，將於葵青劇院載譽重演大型舞蹈詩《緣起敦煌》；劇中「法相莊嚴」選段榮獲二○一五年新布拉格國際舞蹈藝術節特別大獎及全劇於二○一六年第五屆全國少數民族文藝會演獲「最佳導演獎」兩項殊榮。北京演出更獲全國50個媒體廣泛報導，對香港的演繹予以讚賞。《緣起敦煌》將新增金剛威儀、水月觀音和絲路同心等舞段。
event.desce: Hong Kong Dance Federation proudly presents the award-winning production Dunhuang Reflections in response to One Belt One Road at the Kwai Tsing Theater.  Its excerpt “Austere Image” has won the New Prague International Dance Festival 2015 Special Award and the Best Director Award for the full production in The 5th Minorities Art Festival of China.  This enhanced version will include new dances of Heavenly Guardians, the Water Margin Guan Yin and Silk Road Harmony to further illuminate the glamour of Dunhuang's beauty.
event.presenterorgc:
香港舞蹈總會主辦
鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署
event.presenterorge:
Presented by Hong Kong Dance Federation
Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.remarkc: 每張門票只限一人進場﹝包括嬰兒﹞。本節目備有輪椅座席，4個位於表演場地面，票價為每張$680，10個位於表演場5樓，票價為每張$400。每個輪椅席可附設1個同等票價的看護人座位。
event.remarke: Each ticket admits one person only (including infant). 4 wheelchair seats on arena floor and 10 wheelchair seats on permanent wheelchair platforms at 5/F are available at $680 per ticket and $400 per ticket respectively. Each wheelchair patron can be accompanied by one minder (optional) with ticket at the same price.

event.titlec: 出生入死 ─ 戰地記者
event.descc: 展覽回顧戰地記者的出現、他們在戰爭中所扮演的角色，以及近年香港媒體參與戰爭報道的故事，當中包括十九、二十世紀的多場主要戰爭，如克里米亞戰爭、甲午戰爭、兩次世界大戰及越戰等。
event.desce: This exhibition reviews the emergence of war correspondents and the role they have played in wars and conflicts, while also featuring stories of local journalists who have covered hostilities in various regions. [...]

event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 武‧藝‧人生 ─ 李小龍
event.descc: 李小龍自信不凡的性格與中西文化交融的個人背景交織成他的傳奇人生。展覽將為大家帶來超過六百多件珍貴的文物，讓大家可以全面地、立體地、自主地從他的個人、電影、功夫、文化現象等多方面，對他作深入了解。
event.desce: More than 600 invaluable items of Bruce Lee memorabilia will be showcased to create an exhibition that looks at Bruce Lee from a more comprehensive, in-depth and independent perspective.

event.titlec: 粤劇日2017
event.descc: 「粤劇日」今年已邁進第十五個年頭，精彩節目包括： ‧ 舞台劇《戲裡戲外看戲班》 ‧ 開幕演出 ‧ 新蕊粤劇場 ‧ 兒童粤劇舞台 ‧ 電影 (香港太空館)  ‧ 講座 ‧ 名伶簽名會 ‧ 示範工作坊：粤劇身段功架、親子化妝及面譜、唱腔及樂器 ‧ 攤位活動 ‧ 英語及普通話導賞團 ‧ 粤劇文物選粹展覽
event.desce: Cantonese Opera Day is into its fifteenth year, fun-filled programmes include: ‧ Drama BACKSTAGE ‧ Opening Performance ‧ Young Cantonese Opera Artists Showcase ‧ Children Cantonese Opera Artists Showcase ‧ Film Show (Hong Kong Space Museum) ‧ Talks ‧ Autograph Sessions ‧ Demonstration Workshops: Stylized Movement & Posture, Parent-child Make-up & Face Mask Drawing, Singing Style & Musical Instruments in Cantonese Opera ‧ Stall Games ‧ Guided Tour (conducted in English & Putonghua) ‧ Cantonese Opera Exhibition
event.remarkc: 主辦機構有權更改節目及更換表演者。 本節目內容不反映康樂及文化事務署的意見。
event.remarke: The presenter reserves the right to change the programme and substitute artists. The programme does not represent the views of the Leisure and Cultural Services Department.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.descc: 粤劇折子戲及粤曲演唱會(二) 21.11.2017 (星期二) 晚上7時30分 演唱︰ 周仕深《琵琶巷口故人來》 吳婉芬、張月玲《九天玄女‧火殉、天女于歸》 郭志芳、姜慧敏《再世紅梅記‧脫阱救裴》 折子戲︰ 謝曉瑜《六月雪‧竇娥冤》 何偉凌、林穎施《百花亭贈劍》 阮兆輝、黃綺雯《白兔會‧榮歸團圓》
event.desce: 21.11.2017 (Tue) 7:30pm Main Cast (in order of appearance): Chow Sze-sum, Ng Yuen-fan, Cheung Yuet-ling, Kowk Chi-fong, Keung Wai-man, Xie Xiaoyu, Ho Wai-ling, Lin Yingshi, Yuen Siu-fai, Wong Yee-man

event.titlec: 室內歌劇：徐訏《鬼戀》
event.titlee: Chamber Opera: Xu Xu’s Ghost Love
event.predateC: 2018年1月12-13日（五至六） 晚上8時 2018年1月14日（日） 下午3時
event.progtimec: 節目演出長約1小時30分鐘，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes without intermission.
event.descc:
改編自徐訏同名小說。普通話演出，中英文字幕。
1945年。夜晚，一個男人遇到了一隻女鬼。如月當空，這位「鬼」皎潔而明慧。男人有情，面對這皎月之容、美貌不俗的「女鬼」，一心要揭開謎底，看看這一場緣份的真相。
1955年，男人已離開戰後的上海，獨自到了香港。那段刻骨的暗夜記憶，在同樣陰冷濕寒的空氣裡再現，聲聲敲擊著……
如何從禁錮中走出？打開了鬼的世界，才知道人是甚麼。
event.desce:
Based on Xu Xu’s novella. Performed in Putonghua with Chinese and English surtitles.
1945. At night, a man meets a woman’s ghost. Like the moon above, the “ghost” is bright and pure. The man, moved and touched by her moon-lit beauty, seeks to unravel the enigma about her and see where their relationship would lead.
1955, the man has left post-war Shanghai and is alone in Hong Kong. The dark unforgettable memory of those times recurs again in same dark dank air, throbbing…
How does one free oneself from bondage? When the world of ghosts is revealed, we learn what it is to be human.
event.remarkc:
集體購票優惠 每次購買正價門票4至9張可獲9折優惠；10至19張可獲85折優惠；20張或以上可獲8折優惠。
上述購票優惠只可享用其一，請於購票時通知票務人員。
event.remarke:
Group Booking Discount 10% off for each purchase of 4-9 standard tickets, 15% off for 10-19 standard tickets, 20% off for 20 or more standard tickets.
Patrons can enjoy only one of the above discount offers. Please inform the box office staff at the time of purchase.

event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 親子／兒童／小先鋒節目：農村入廚樂
event.titlee: Children / Family / MuseKids Programme: The Joy of Country Cooking
event.predateC: 2017年10月1日至12月31日（每逢星期六、日）下午2:00至2:45
event.descc: 新界鄉民在喜慶活動及節日時，有「吃盆菜」的習俗。小朋友可以藉著活動認識本地傳統飲食文化，更有機會運用模擬食材及用具炮製模擬盆菜，體驗村民分工合作的精神，共享入廚樂。導師：博物館大使。是次活動為「兒童探知館」特備節目。
event.desce: The pun choi, or basin feast, is often served out in the open in country villages during religious rituals, festivals and other special occasions. With an assortment of food props and model cooking utensils at hand, our little chefs will “cook up” a sumptuous pun choi feast and get a glimpse into both our age-old food culture and the co-operative clansman spirit. Instructors: Museum Ambassadors. In association with the "Children's Discovery Gallery".
event.remarkc: 名額每節10位小朋友，先到先得。請於活動開始前30分鐘在兒童探知館入口處報名。
event.remarke: A maximum of 10 children per session on a first-come-first-served basis. To register, please sign up at the entrance to the Children’s Discovery Gallery 30 minutes before the programme commences.

event.titlec: 「中國音樂與普洱」茶聚
event.descc: 主持：葉榮枝先生 ∣ 譚寶碩先生 ∣ 王偉明先生 ∣ 唐健垣博士 樂師：胡山林女士 ∣ 姚欣女士 ∣ 王靜怡女士 ∣ 陳璧沁女士 呷一杯普洱茶的同時靜聽悠揚中樂是都市人難得的享受，豈能錯過！
event.desce: Moderator：Mr. Ip Wing-chi ∣ Mr. Tam Po-shek ∣ Mr. Wong Wai-ming ∣ Dr. Tong Kin-woon Musician：Ms Woo Shan-lam ∣ Ms lu Yan∣Ms Wong Ching-yee ∣ Ms Chan Pik-sum Sipping a cup of pu'er tea and listening to Chinese music at the same time is a difficult-to-get enjoyment of the people in the city, how you could miss it!

event.titlec: 城市藝裳計劃：藝滿階梯
event.descc: 為慶祝香港特別行政區成立二十周年，又逢香港藝術館五十五周年紀念，本館特別推出「城市藝裳計劃：藝滿階梯」戶外藝術項目，以館藏花卉內容的作品，配合四季主題，為各區的階梯穿上花裝。作品涵蓋古今中外，既有傳統國畫大師作品，亦有十九世紀的歷史繪畫；更包羅當代作品，又有紡織品、漆器和竹器等文物。此外，更會每月於不同地區舉行各種教育活動，希望透過階梯的展出和配套活動，使大家在日常生活中亦能感受藝術與自然的趣味。
event.desce: The outdoor art project decorating staircases in various districts with motifs of flowers sourced from the Museum’s collection. Our selection spans a great variety of works, including traditional Chinese paintings; historical pictures from the 19th century; contemporary art pieces; antiquities covering textiles; lacquer ware and bamboo carvings. With exhibition of the dress-up staircases, and educational activities held in different districts, you are welcome [...]
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

With exhibition of the dress-up staircases, and educational activities held in different districts, you are welcome [...]

event.descc: 為慶祝香港特別行政區成立二十周年，又逢香港藝術館五十五周年紀念，本館特別推出「城市藝裳計劃：藝滿階梯」戶外藝術項目，以館藏花卉內容的作品，配合四季主題，為各區的階梯穿上花裝。作品涵蓋古今中外，既有傳統國畫大師作品，亦有十九世紀的歷史繪畫；更包羅當代作品，又有紡織品、漆器和竹器等文物。此外，更會每月於不同地區舉行各種教育活動，希望透過階梯的展出和配套活動，使大家在日常生活中亦能感受藝術與自然的趣味。
event.desce: The outdoor art project decorating staircases in various districts with motifs of flowers sourced from the Museum’s collection. Our selection spans a great variety of works, including traditional Chinese paintings; historical pictures from the 19th century; contemporary art pieces; antiquities covering textiles; lacquer ware and bamboo carvings. With exhibition of the dress-up staircases, and educational activities held in different districts, you are welcome [...]

event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 舞蹈日2017
event.descc: 舞蹈日2017將會是第七屆的舞蹈日。 今屆主題為「無疆界」，展示舞者的冒險精神，不斷尋求突破，從而打破觀眾與舞者之間的界限。 舞蹈日2017「舞蹈日2016」將展示本地舞蹈界的全方位力量。資深及新進舞蹈家，將聯同專業及業餘舞團，以及不同社群一起於屯門大會堂及屯門文娛廣場演繹不同風格、多姿多采的舞蹈及活動。我們特別邀請到本地資深舞蹈家王廷琳擔任活動顧問。 同時，大會亦安排了 工作坊及展覽等推廣活動，以及舞蹈自主地帶「舞得起！」 ，讓市民一起舞動，享受舞蹈的樂趣。 精彩內容： 舞蹈匯演 舞蹈自主地帶「舞得起！」 自由舞動一分鐘 環境舞蹈快閃 緣舞場 廣場舞蹈 階段式創作演出 工作坊 節目如有更改，以康樂及文化事務署最後公布為準。 本節目的內容並不反映康樂及文化事務署的意見。 查詢﹕2268 7323
event.desce: Dance Day 2017 will be the 8th Dance Day.  The main theme of this year is 'No Boundary'.  Dancers would unveil their adventurous spirit, desire for breakthrough and pull down the wall between audiences and dancers. Similar to previous Dance Days, Dance Day 2017 will showcase different generations of local dance talents.  Veteran and emerging dance artists as well as professional and amateur dance groups will join hands with different social groups to give a wide variety of delightful and exhilarating dance performances and activities at Tuen Mun Town Hall and Tuen Mun Cultural Square.   Renowned local choreographer/ dancer, Andy Wong is invited to be the Event Advisor for Dance Day. Moreover, participatory activities such as workshops and exhibitions will be organized.  There will also be the 'U Can Dance!' Free Dancing Zone where everyone is welcome to join in and enjoy the fun of dancing. Content : Dance Showcase 'U Can Dance!' Free Dancing Zone One Minute Flash Dance Site-specific Flash Mob Dance Improvisation Land Public Square Dancing Work-in-progress Presentation Workshop Programmes are subject to change with announcements by the Leisure and Cultural Services Department as final. The contents of this programme do not represent the views of the Leisure and Cultural Services Department. Enquiries: 2268 7323

event.titlec: 非常林奕華《聊齋》
event.titlee: Edward Lam Dance Theatre – “Why We Chat?
event.predateC: 2018年1月25日至27日 (星期四至六) 晚上7:30 2018年1月28日 (星期日) 下午2:30
event.progtimec: 演出全長約3小時15分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘。
event.progtimee: The running time of the performance is approximately 3 hours and 15 minutes with 15 minutes intermission.
event.descc:
普通話演出，附中文字幕
非常林奕華第58齣劇場作品 《聊齋》"Why We Chat?"
繼《賈寶玉》、《三國》、《恨嫁家族》林奕華與黃詠詩四度合作
「我不相信死後有另一個世界在等我，也不相信會有其他的超能力存在，去圓滿我的夢；《聊齋》人鬼狐交織出來的世界，現實和虛幻之間，我看見無盡對生命的期許。我在乎的，是在這一片混沌的世界，當每個人真正獨自一人的時候，到底雕弄出了一個怎樣的說法，築起一個怎麼樣的世界，去說服自己，然後回到現實，頑強地戰鬥下去。也許，劇場就是這樣的一個地方 。」──黃詠詩
我為什麼要創作一部叫《聊齋》的舞台劇？因為，現代人愈來愈『怕』跟人『聊天』了。因為，我們愈來愈怕『人』了。因為，在情感世界裏，愈來愈多人活得像『鬼』：把黑夜當白天，視付出為畏途，以致心態上很像鬼故事中的『鬼』：要存在，就要『採陽補陰』。怕『人』，但又要在『人』身上得到力量，『鬼』與『人』的角力，較真，就在『心理上』鬥智，而更複雜的，是他們中間還有第三者：不怕『聊天』（去探索人心）的狐。」──林奕華
「透過再創造的戲，林奕華給觀眾的，不是答案，而是一連串的問題。藉由閱讀、重讀名著，我們有了更豐富、更深邃的體會──不見得是體會名著，而是體會自己。」──楊照
特邀演出： 張艾嘉、王耀慶 演員： 路嘉欣、趙逸嵐、葉麗嘉、時一修、戴旻學、王宏元、黃俊傑
event.desce:
In Putonghua with Chinese Surtitles
The 58th original theatre work by Edward Lam Dance Theatre
A theatre piece on modern love and ghost stories inspired by Liao Zhai
Sylvia Cheung X David Wang Edward Lam X Wong Wing Sze
A gentleman on a business trip checks himself into a hotel. Just as he was feeling really bored, he received a call from a lady who claimed to be a fellow patron in the hotel and was randomly calling people as she was equally bored. The two lonely souls started a bet to see who can interest the other with a story on the hotel and the winner will get to see the other party. This started a whole series of cat and mouse games between the duo as they move around the hotel, uncovering many hidden stories, ‘catching demons’, ‘catching ghosts’, trying to catch each other. Traversing between reality and the stories being spun about oneself, the line between reality and fallacy gets blurred.
event.remarkc: 本節目含成人內容及不雅用語
event.remarke: The programme contains adult content and coarse language.

event.titlec: 當代舞體驗講座系列 舞蹈解碼
event.titlee: Experiential Lecture Series on Contemporary Dance - Decoding
event.agelimitc: 歡迎年滿6歲的觀眾入場。
event.agelimite: Audiences aged 6 and above are welcome.
event.descc: 講者 王廷琳 張秀梅 客席講者 徐奕婕 陳敏兒 粵語主講 要為舞蹈解碼，我們可以從創作的源頭開始，了解構成舞蹈的元素，最基本包括音樂、動作、空間運用等，這都是引領觀眾欣賞及解構舞蹈的基本工具。是次講座系列將分為兩部分，第一部分將透過編舞家現身說法，探討舞蹈創作的過程，窺探編舞家在舞蹈編創背後的理念與構思。第二部分則以互動環節及觀賞錄像的形式進行，讓編舞家與參加者一起探討當代舞蹈的特質。 是次講座系列將由王廷琳及張秀梅兩位資深的舞蹈學者主講。王廷琳畢業於香港演藝學院，主修芭蕾舞。一九九○年畢業後，隨即加入香港芭蕾舞團，一九九一年應邀加入城市當代舞蹈團，一九九四年獲亞洲文化協會何鴻燊獎學金赴美國研習現代舞，在美國各地進行教學及演出等文化交流活動，一九九五年回港後，與梁家權、黃茹重組動藝，致力發展現代舞及推廣舞蹈教育。張秀梅則為香港演藝學院前任舞蹈系講師，教學範疇包括身體覺知導引及訓練，舞蹈藝術學士（榮譽）學位及碩士課程的舞蹈教育課程，並負責開發外展項目及擔任研究生的顧問導師。兩位講者對舞蹈的專業、經驗與熱誠，定能增加參與者對當代舞蹈的認識，提高他們對賞舞的興趣。 第一節 如何看《睡蓮》? (2017年9月6日) 講者：王廷琳、徐奕婕 第二節 《別 離別》的緣來緣去  (2017年9月13日) 講者：王廷琳、張秀梅、呂以輝 第三節 《剝花生與花生騷》(2017年9月20日) 講者：張秀梅、陳敏兒 第四節   阿隆佐·金舞蹈團 （美國） Alonzo King LINES Ballet  (USA)   (2017年9月27日) 講者：王廷琳、張秀梅 第五節及第六節 荷蘭舞蹈劇場  Nederlands Dans Theater (NDT)   (2017年11月1日及8日) 講者：王廷琳、張秀梅 第七節   克利絲桃．派特 Cystal Pite   (2017年11月13日) 講者：王廷琳、張秀梅 第八節   跳舞 / 編舞 / 說舞人的真我對話  (2017年11月22日) 講者：王廷琳、張秀梅
event.desce:
Speakers Andy Wong Vanessa Cheung
Guest Speakers Ivy Tsui Abby Chan
(Conducted in Cantonese)
We can decode a dance piece by looking into a few basic elements of composition, such as music, movement and spatial relationships.  These are in fact the basic tools to help audiences to appreciate dance.  This lecture and workshop series will be divided into two parts.  In part one, we will look into the creative process, venture into the mind of a choreographer and to decipher how a dance piece is being put together.  In part two, we will investigate the nature of dance through interactive activities, video viewing and discussion with choreographers. Session 1: How to appreciate 'Water Lilies'?  (6.9.2017)  Speakers: Andy Wong, Ivy Tsui Session 2: 'Separating From Separation' by DancingAngels (13.9.2017)  Speakers: Andy Wong,  Vanessa Cheung, Frankie Lui Session 3: Running on the 'Cattle Runway' by Abby Chan (20.9.2017)  Speakers: Vanessa Cheung, Abby Chan Session 4: Alonzo King LINES Ballet (USA)  (27.9.2017)  Speakers: Andy Wong,  Vanessa Cheung Session 5 & 6: Nederlands Dans Theater (NDT) (1 & 8.11.2017)  Speakers: Andy Wong,  Vanessa Cheung Session 7: Crystal Pite (13.11.2017)  Speakers: Andy Wong,  Vanessa Cheung Session 8: Genuine dialogues among the dancers, choreographers and narrators  (22.11.2017)  Speakers: Andy Wong,  Vanessa Cheung

event.titlec: 影片欣賞：《革命的足跡：歷史的傳承》
event.titlee: Film Show: “Footprints of the Revolution: Passing on History”
event.predateE: 18, 28 Oct (Wed, Sat) and 11, 19, 22 Nov (Sat, Sun, Wed) and 3, 6, 30 Dec 2017 (Sun, Wed, Sat) 2:00pm - 2:30pm
event.descc: 節目為香港電台製作 節目闡述孫中山先生的革命事業與香港的關係，並講述孫中山先生與梅屋莊吉的情誼，以及其他革命志士所付出的努力。
event.desce: The video programme is produced by the RTHK. The programme discusses the connection between Dr Sun Yat-sen’s revolutionary campaign and Hong Kong, while providing an account of the friendship between Dr Sun and Umeya Shoukichi as well as the contributions of other revolutionaries.
event.remarkc: 展覽廳將於影片放映前5分鐘開始入座；即場參加，滿座即止。
event.remarke: Audience will be admitted 5 minutes before each show commences. First come, first served.
event.presenterorgc: 孫中山紀念館
event.presenterorge: Dr Sun Yat-sen Museum

event.desce: The video programme is produced by the RTHK. The programme tells of Dr Sun Yat-sen’s experienceduring the revolution as well as the course and results of his work onreforming China’s politics and society.

event.descc:
13.12.2017 (星期三) 晚上7時30分
《焚香記》之〈情探〉 陳澤蕾、瓊花女、詹浩鋒
《西廂記》之〈拷紅〉 陳好逑、尤聲普
《高平關取級》（古腔排場戲） 李龍、阮兆輝
《香羅塚》之〈大審〉 龍貫天、陳咏儀、溫玉瑜、盧麗斯、郭俊聲、吳立熙、司徒翠英
《雙仙拜月亭》之〈抱石投江〉 阮兆輝、陳好逑、尤聲普、黎耀威、盧麗斯、郭俊聲、張潔霞
14.12.2017 (星期四) 晚上7時30分
《紅樓夢》之〈幻覺離恨天〉 陳澤蕾、瓊花女
《西廂記》之〈拷紅〉 陳好逑、尤聲普
《高平關取級》（古腔排場戲） 李龍、阮兆輝
《摘纓會》之〈恩怨情仇〉 龍貫天、陳咏儀、郭俊聲、溫玉瑜、黎耀威、唐宛瑩
《雙仙拜月亭》之〈抱石投江〉 阮兆輝、陳好逑、尤聲普、黎耀威、盧麗斯、郭俊聲、張潔霞
event.desce:
13.12.2017 (Wed) 7:30pm
Love Probe from The Story of the Burning Incense Chan Chak-lui, Juliana Kwan, Jim Ho-fung
Interrogating the Red Maid from Romance of the West Chamber Chan Ho-kau, Yau Sing-po
Retrieving the Head at Gao Ping Guan (Formulaic Paichang play in ancient vocal style) Lee Lung, Yuen Siu-fai
The Big Trial from The Lady's Sash Loong Koon-tin, Chan Wing-yee, Wan Yuk-yu, Lo Lai-see, Kwok Chun-sing, Ng Lap-hei, Szeto Chui-ying

14.12.2017 (Thu) 7:30pm
Fantasy of Heaven of Parting Sorrow from The Dream of the Red Mansion Chan Chak-lui, Juliana Kwan
Interrogating the Red Maid from Romance of the West Chamber Chan Ho-kau, Yau Sing-po
Retrieving the Head at Gao Ping Guan (Formulaic Paichang play in ancient vocal style) Lee Lung, Yuen Siu-fai

event.titlec: 互動環節：手造筆記簿製作
event.titlee: Hands-on Activities: The Making of Handmade Notebook
event.descc: 導師將帶領參加者以甘棠第建築特色元素製作別具特色的手造筆記簿。
event.desce: Drawing on Kom Tong Hall's architectural features, the instructor will show participants how to make special notebooks.
event.remarkc: 活動於當日下午2時開始在二樓活動室接受報名；每節24人；先到先得，額滿即止。每位參加者將最多獲發一張登記證，名額先到先得，額滿即止。參加者須憑登記證入場參加互動環節。有關活動安排如有任何爭議，本館保留最後決定權。
event.remarke: Registration starts at 2 pm, at the Activity Room, 2/F; 24 persons per session; first come, first served.Each participant will be given maximum one admission token on a first come first served basis. Partcipants are required to show the tokens for admission. In case of disputes, the Museum reserves the right to the final arrangements of the activities.

event.presenterorge: Dr Sun Yat-sen Museum

event.desce: Guqin: Sou Si-tai, Lau Chor-wah, Tse Chun-yan, Ng Ying-wai, John Yiu Shek-on Guqin/Xiao: Chung Siu-sun Xiao: Ken Wu Yun-kan Vocal: Cheung Lai-chun

event.titlec: 德愔琴社《琴韻心傳：古琴示範講座》
event.titlee: Heart of Guqin Heritage: Demonstration Talks on Guqin by the Deyin Qin Society
event.predateC: 2017年11月24日至12月15日（逢星期五）晚上7時30分
event.progtimec: 講座長約1小時30分鐘，不包括中場休息。
event.progtimee: The talk will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes without intermission.
event.descc:
第一講：傳統琴曲的蛻變與打譜 （講者：謝俊仁） 第二講：古琴流播的雅俗視角（講者：余少華） 第三講：蔡德允與香港本土琴學（講者：黃樹志） 第四講：邊塞「曲」：琴曲中的西域主題、聲音與意象（講者：黃泉鋒）
粵語主講
event.desce:
First Session: Changes on Transmission of Traditional Guqin Pieces and their Reconstruction (Speaker: Tse Chu-yan) Second Session: The Elegant (proper) and Popular Perspectives of the Transmission of Guqin (Speaker: Yu Siu-wah) Third Session: Madam Tsar Teh-yun and the Local Guqin Studies in Hong Kong (Speaker: Wong Shu-chee) Forth Session: Frontier Sounds: China’s Northwestern Borderlands in the Music of the Guqin (Speaker: Chuen-fung Wong)
Conducted in Cantonese

event.titlec: 鴻嘉寶粤劇團「光輝粤映」
event.titlee: Hung Ka Po Cantonese Opera Troupe - Glorious Eras of Cantonese Opera
event.progtimec: 演出長約3小時15分鐘（包括中場休息15分鐘）
event.progtimee: Running time of the performance is approximately 3 hours and 15 minutes including an intermission of 15 minutes.
event.descc: 《福星高照之訪艷》 藍天佑、陳咏儀、梁煒康、黎耀威、王潔清 《胡不歸之慰妻》 龍貫天、南鳳 《再世紅梅記之救裴》 藍天佑、陳咏儀、一点鴻 《雷鳴金鼓戰笳聲之怒闖聚英台》 龍貫天、南鳳、陳鴻進、黎耀威 《白龍關》（下卷） 阮德文、鄧美玲 《花蕊夫人之劫後描容》 龍貫天、陳咏儀
event.desce: “Visiting the Beauty” from “Lucky Stars” Main Cast: Lam Tin-yau, Chan Wing-yee, Leung Wai-hong, Lai Yiu-wai, Wang Kit-ching “Visiting the Wife” from “Time to Go Home” Main Cast: Loong Koon-tin, Nam Fung “The Rescue of Pei” from “The Reincarnation of the Plum Blossom” Main Cast: Lam Tin-yau, Chan Wing-yee, Ryder Chan “The Fury at Juying Pavilion” from “The Sounds of Battle” Main Cast: Loong Koon-tin, Nam Fung, Chan Hung-chun, Lai Yiu-wai “White Dragon Pass” (Part II) Main Cast: Ruan Dewen, Tang Mi-ling “Depicting the Image after the Crisis” from “Madam Pistil” Main Cast: Loong Koon-tin, Chan Wing-yee
event.remarkc: 全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠門票先到先得，額滿即止。
event.remarke: Limited concessionary tickets for full-time students and CSSA recipients available on a first-come-first-served basis.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 陳柏宇Speechless 2017演唱會
event.remarkc: 每張門票只限一人進場（包括嬰兒）。本節目每場備有64個輪椅座位，每個輪椅座位可附設1 個看顧人座位。
event.remarke: Each ticket admits one person only (including infant). 64 wheelchair seats, each accompanied with one optional minder seat are available for each performance of the event.
event.presenterorgc: Sony Music Entertainment Hong Kong Limited, 煇皇娛樂有限公司, 智樂演藝文化有限公司, 夢想沙龍娛樂文化有限公司, Moov (Hong Kong) Limited; 大國文化製作有限公司, 星娛樂(環宇)有限公司, 太限娛樂演唱會有限公司, 湯臣國際娛樂有限公司, Triks Limited
event.presenterorge: Sony Music Entertainment Hong Kong Limited, Artist Group Entertainment Limited, CL Showbiz Limited, Dreams Salon Entertainment Culture Limited, Moov (Hong Kong) Limited, Music Nation Productions Company Limited, Star Entertainment (Universe) Limited, Sun Entertainment Concert Limited, Tomson International Entertainment Company Limited, Triks Limited

event.titlec: 爵士‧樂系列：張駿豪及卓可榮「載行」
event.titlee: Jazz Up Series: Departure by Teriver Cheung and Chok Kerong
event.predateC: 2018年1月5日 (五) 下午8時 2018年1月6日 (六) 下午8時
event.progtimec: 演出長約1小時35分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 35 minutes including a 15 minutes intermission.
event.descc: 在《載行》中，張駿豪將聯同新加坡作曲家及鍵盤手卓可榮創作全新作品。作品將輔以結他與風琴爵士三重奏、四人銅／木管樂器混合組合與弦樂四重奏的獨特配器。
event.desce: Departure is a joint project between Teriver Cheung and Singaporean composer and keyboardist Chok Kerong.  A project further explores the jazz / classical blend: a jazz organ trio along with a four-piece brass / woodwind section and a string quartet.
event.remarkc: 「爵士‧樂」系列套票優惠 同時購買「安東尼奧．山查斯及遷移樂團」音樂會及「張駿豪及卓可榮《載行》」的正價門票，可獲9折優惠。
event.remarke: “Jazz Up” Series Package Discount 10% off for each purchase of standard tickets for “Antonio Sanchez with Migration Band” and “Departure by Teriver Cheung and Chok Kerong”.

event.titlec: 爵士‧樂系列：安東尼奧‧山查斯及遷移樂團
event.titlee: Jazz Up Series: Antonio Sanchez with Migration Band
event.progtimec: 演出長約1小時30分鐘，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes without intermission.
event.descc: 格林美獎得主、當代爵士樂壇最炙手可熱的鼓手之一安東尼奧．山查斯將聯同遷移樂團，包括薩克管手謝默斯．布萊克、鋼琴手約翰．艾斯克里特、低音大提琴手麥．布魯爾以及主音坦娜．亞歷克莎，演奏其最新發行並不斷發展的專輯《子午線組曲》。
event.desce: Grammy Award winner, one of the most sought-after drummers on the international jazz scene, Antonio Sanchez, will tour in Hong Kong with Migration Band members including Seamus Blake on saxophone, John Escreet on piano, Matt Brewer on bass, and Thana Alexa on vocal, to play their latest album The Meridian Suite, which has developed further in live performance.

event.titlec: 絲路瑰寶講座系列—中亞細亞音樂：維吾爾與新疆
event.titlee: Lecture Series on the Silk Road - Music in Central Asia: The Uyghurs and Xinjiang
event.predateC: 2017年12月20日至2018年1月10日（逢星期三，12月27日除外）晚上7時30分
event.progtimec: 每場講座長約1小時30分鐘。
event.progtimee: Each lecture will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes.
event.descc:
講者：黃泉鋒博士
「絲綢之路」一詞及其相關的文化、音樂和藝術，近年大受關注。當中一部分涉及「維吾爾（族）」、「西域」、「新疆」等主題，夾雜着各種既有的權力關係，亦有新近形成的跨國族視界，對華／漢人聽眾來說都不陌生。三場講座以音樂出發，以三種不同角度窺視（聽）「絲綢之路」在華文世界內外的「少數民族」聲音。
第一講：聽見「能歌善舞」：現代國樂的西域情調 第二講：維吾爾音樂的中亞細亞風格與技藝 第三講：現代新疆電影的「少數民族」音樂主題
粵語主講
event.desce:
Speaker: Dr Chuen-Fung Wong
The rekindled interest in the Silk Road as a trope for performing Chinese identities over the past decade or so has brought enormous attention to the Uyghur, who are Central Asian Turkic Muslims residing in the northwestern Chinese province of Xinjiang. The series of three talks seeks to listen closely to the voices of the Uyghur by exploring music and other aspects of traditional and modern Uyghur performing arts.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 講座：孫中山與南京
event.titlee: Lecture: Dr Sun Yat-sen and Nanjing
event.pricec: 免費參加 (名額有限，滿座即止。)
event.descc: 周佳榮教授（香港浸會大學歷史系教授） 講座將介紹孫中山先生成立中華民國的歷程，以及在南京臨時政府成立後推行的內政和外交。
event.desce: By Professor Chow Kai Wing (Professor, Department of History, Hong Kong Baptist University) The talk will introduce Dr Sun Yat-sen’s journey in founding the Republic of China, as well as the domestic and foreign policies implemented after the establishment of the Nanjing Provisional Government.
event.remarkc: 座位40，先到先得，滿座即止，演講廳將於講座開始前五分鐘開放。
event.remarke: 40 seats, first come, first served, admitted 5 minutes before the lecture starts.
event.presenterorgc: 孫中山紀念館
event.presenterorge: Dr Sun Yat-sen Museum

event.titlec: 講座：香港科技教育的起源與香港現代化
event.titlee: Lecture: Origins of Hong Kong Technical Education and Modernisation of Hong Kong
event.pricec: 免費參加 (名額有限，滿座即止。)
event.descc: 馬冠堯工程師（香港大學房地產及建設系客席副教授） 講者將介紹兩間在二十世紀初成立的工業學院：私立的李陞格致學堂及官立的香港技術學院，從而帶出香港技術和工業教育的源頭及其對香港現代化的貢獻。
event.desce: By Ir. Ma Koon Yiu (Adjunct Associate Professor, Department of Real Estate and Construction, The University of Hong Kong) The speaker will talk about the origins of Hong Kong technical education using two discarded examples at the turn of the centuries: the private Li Shing Scientific and Industrial College and the Government Hong Kong Technical Institute, and their contributions to the modernization of Hong Kong.
event.remarkc: 座位40，先到先得，滿座即止，演講廳將於講座開始前五分鐘開放。
event.remarke: 40 seats, first come, first served, admitted 5 minutes before the lecture starts.
event.presenterorgc: 孫中山紀念館
event.presenterorge: Dr Sun Yat-sen Museum

event.titlec: 香港製造
event.descc: 是次展覽逾百件的文物精選自香港歷史博物館館藏，當中不乏秉承傳統、家喻戶曉的百年老店產品，也包含隨工業起飛應運而生的各類產品，讓觀眾回顧香港製造業的輝煌日子，並體現港人靈活變通、因時制宜的創新精神。
event.desce: Selected from the collection of the Hong Kong Museum of History and showcasing over a hundred collections including traditional, century-old branded products as well as various products manufactured during the industry-boom, the "Made in Hong Kong" exhibition aims to illustrate the heyday of the Hong Kong manufacturing industries in retrospect and manifest the flexibility, adaptability and creativity of the local people.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.progtimec: 音樂會全長約1小時40分鐘，包括中場休息20分鐘。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 40 minutes, including a 20 minute intermission.
event.remarkc:
早鳥優惠 於2017年9月1日至9月30日期間購買正價門票，可獲95折優惠。
集體購票優惠 每次購買正價門票10張或以上可獲9折優惠。
「樂．誼國際音樂節」套票優惠 同時購買音樂節兩場或以上的音樂會（開幕音樂會、室樂之夜、兒童音樂會及閉幕音樂會）的正價門票，可獲9折優惠。
上述購票優惠只可享用其一。
event.remarke:
Advanced Booking Discount 5% off for each purchase of Standard tickets from 1-30 Sep 2017.
Group Booking Discount 10% off for each purchase of 10 or more tickets for each concert.
Musicus Fest Package Discount 10% off for each purchase of 2 or more concerts. (Festival Opening, Chamber Music Gala, Children’s Concerts & Finale Concert)
Patrons can enjoy only one of the above discount offers.

event.titlec: 全天域電影《藍海探秘》
event.descc: 全天域電影《藍海探秘》歷時三年在全球不同水域取景，利用特別研發的水底攝影工具以超高清5K、慢動作攝影、微距拍攝及移動控制等先進技術，捕捉三十多個物種的精彩影像，揭示牠們的有趣行為。你無需任何裝備，就可投入這片瑰麗的水世界。
event.desce: Filmed over three years around the globe with the specifically developed tools that allow underwater filming in ultra-HD 5K, slow motion, macro and motion control, the OMNIMAX Show "Jean-Michel Cousteau's Secret Ocean" captures extraordinary images of over 30 species and reveals the interesting behaviours of these creatures. Come immerse yourself in the magnificent water world. No gears required.
event.remarkc: 平日：下午1時30分、5時及8時30分星期六、日及公眾假期：下午1時30分、5時及8時30分(星期六、日及公眾假期晚上8時30分場次為英語旁述)

event.titlec: 前進進戲劇工作坊《聽搖滾的北京猿人》
event.titlee: On & On Theatre Workshop – “The Phenomenon of Man: REVOLVER”
event.progtimec: 節目全長約2小時，不設中場休息
event.progtimee: The running time of the performance is approximately 2 hours without intermission.
event.descc:
粵語演出
──Noosphere，一個精神互通的場域，進化的下一步，由物質層面轉向精神層面。 人類在生物層入面作為精神發展到最頂端的物種，開始互相接近趨向同化。
2021年近未來香港，女演員萬華在預備遴選《海鷗》，驚遇鬼魂妮娜‧蘇古諾娃，她熱切期望一場真正革命的誕生。兩年半前在香港掘到北京猿人化石，全港哄動，北京大力鼓勵香港發展做猿人考古主題城市，創造新工種。自由撰稿員阿照在理想與現實之間載浮載沉，為發展局宣傳北京猿人的同時，追憶起當年佔領點滴，尋找生存方向……
20至30年代間北京，曾參與周口店北京猿人頭骨發掘工作的法國考古學家、天主教神父德日進開始寫作《人的現象》一書，知己雕塑家Lucy Swan陪伴在側，創作北京猿人雕塑Nelly。二人就德提出的進化理論展開連場思辯……
在同一個時空內大家都活在同一個時代，一個全球連繫的時代。
導演：李國威 編劇：胡境陽 文本顧問：陳炳釗 舞台設計：阮漢威 燈光設計：劉銘鏗 作曲及音樂：黃衍仁 音樂及音響設計：岑宗達 服裝設計：張思勤 演出：梁天尺、江浩然、黃衍仁、溫玉茹、邱頌偉、鄭綺釵
有關詳情請參閱主辦機構之網站： www.onandon.org.hk
event.desce:
In Cantonese
──Noosphere, the third phases of development of the Earth, after the geosphere and the biosphere, is the sphere of thought encircling the earth that has emerged through evolution as a consequence of this growth in consciousness.
In 2021 Hong Kong, Nina, a ghost from the end of nineteenth century, who longed for witnessing the birth of a real revolution, bumped into actress MaanWaa. She is preparing her audition for all-time classic Chekhov’s “The Seagull”. Back to two and a half years ago, remains of Peking Man were discovered in Hong Kong. Beijing encouraged Hong Kong transform into an archaeological city to create more job opportunities. Freelancer Ziu struggling between ideal and reality while working on the promotion of Peking Man…… Between twenties to thirties, Pierre Teilhard de Chardin, French Jesuit priest took part in the discovery of Peking Man while writing “The Phenomenon of Man”. Sculptor Lucy Swan accompany him creating the very first Peking Man sculpture Nelly. Debate on the theory of evolution suggested by Chardin happened between them…..
We all live in the same connected era under same time and space.
For details, please refer to the website of the presenter: www.onandon.org.hk

event.titlec: 我們的回憶 — 香港藝術館55周年網上展覽
event.titlee: Our Memories – 55th Anniversary of the Hong Kong Museum of Art Online Exhibition
event.descc: 香港藝術館已成立55年。自1962年起，藝術館在大會堂高座開始服務市民，之後搬到尖沙咀的館址，現在因大型翻新工程而暫時閉館。多年來藝術館積極推動香港藝術，默默耕耘的館長們也在工作崗位上，遇到了無數令人難以忘懷的人和事。 「我們的回憶」網上展覽分享多個由藝術館助理館長透過資料搜集及訪問撰寫的精選故事，重現藝術館縱橫交錯的歷史脈絡。
event.desce: The Hong Kong Museum of Art has served the public for 55 years since its opening at the City Hall High Block in 1962. It was later relocated to Tsim Sha Tsui and is now undergoing temporary closure owing to a major renovation project. Over the years, the Museum has been actively promoting art in Hong Kong. As curators worked devotedly in their roles, countless unforgettable [...]

event.titlec: 外展音樂短期課程
event.descc: 歡迎成人及青少年報名參加的外展音樂短期課程，將於今年9月至明年1月推出新一期課程，當中除了中西樂器基礎班外，另設有多元化的音樂專題課程， 在港九新界多個康文署場地及音樂事務處音樂中心進行，學費$200至$1,000。有興趣參加的人士可於7月17日或之前，透過本處網頁或以郵寄方式遞交申請。
event.desce: To provide short-term fundamental music training for adults, teenagers and children, the territory-wide Outreach Music Interest Courses will offer over a hundred Chinese & Western instrumental classes and music workshops between July 2017 to January 2018. The course fees range from $200 to $1,000. Online and mail applications are now available until 17 July.
event.remarkc: 首輪報名截止日期: 2017年7月17日 網上報名: http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/mo/activities/upcoming/42ndoutreachmusicinterestcourses.html 郵寄報名：招生章程在康文署各表演場地及音樂事務處各音樂中心備取，並可於上列網頁下載；填妥的報名表須於截止日期前寄抵音樂事務處。
event.remarke: Application Deadline: 17 July 2017Online Application: http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/mo/activities/upcoming/42ndoutreachmusicinterestcourses.htmlMail Application: The course prospectus is available at LCSD performing venues and Music Office Music Centres, and could be downloaded at the above webpage; the completed application form should be returned to the Music Office by application deadline.

event.titlec: 彼思動畫30年：家＋友‧加油！
event.titlee: Pixar 30 Years of Animation: Hong Kong Celebration of Friendship and Family
event.pricec: $20 (全日制學生、殘疾人士及六十歲或以上高齡人士半價優惠) $14（20人或以上團體票）
event.pricee: $20 (Half-price concession applicable to full-time students, people with disabilities and senior citizens aged 60 or above) $14 (Group of 20 persons or More)
event.descc: 展覽介紹各種以傳統媒介創作的精選作品，包括素描草圖、彩繪、分鏡圖及雕塑等，這些既是彼思藝術家歷年創作的成果，也是每部動畫電影製作過程中不可或缺的一部分，當中每一形狀、顏色和線條，都是表達角色喜怒哀樂，以至開展故事情節的重要元素。此外，展覽亦透過創作人的訪問片段，讓觀眾窺探原創故事的靈感來源。
event.desce: The exhibition features a fine selection of traditional artwork in various media, including hand-drawn sketches, paintings, storyboards and sculptures, created by the artists at Pixar Animation Studios as they contribute to the development process for each film. Every shape, colour and line in the artwork is designed to convey the desires, heartache, sadness, joy and love of the characters and the story they inhabit.
event.presenterorgc:
康樂及文化事務署與彼思動畫製作室聯合主辦

華特迪士尼（香港）有限公司全力支持
event.presenterorge:
Jointly presented by the Leisure and Cultural Services Department and Pixar Animation Studios
Jointly organised by Hong Kong Heritage Museum and Pixar Animation Studios
Fully supported by The Walt Disney Company (Hong Kong) Limited

event.titlec: 新域劇團《劇場裏的臥虎與藏龍XII》
event.predateC: 2017年11月15至18日(三至六)、11月22至25日(三至六) 晚上8時； 11月19及26日(日) 下午3時
event.progtimec: 節目長約 40分鐘至1小時，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: Running time is about 40 minutes to 1 hour without intermission.
event.descc:
粵語演出
一年一度，臥虎與藏龍大步走出來！
自2006年創辦至今，「劇場裏的臥虎與藏龍計劃」已邁進了第十二年。今年由蔡錫昌先生當召集人，率領十位編劇走出來，一人一劇，與你分享十個故事。
15/11 (三) 晚上8時 余仲賢《蟋蟀》
16/11 (四) 晚上8時 莫耀華《殘猴》
17/11 (五) 晚上8時 陳澍輝《迷航》
18/11 (六) 晚上8時 馮健新《寶貝》
19/11 (日) 下午3時 陳煒雄《奇怪鳥》
22/11 (三) 晚上8時 戴俊鳳《愛在紫薇花樹下》
23/11 (四) 晚上8時 王靈宇《回家》
24/11 (五) 晚上8時 區崇基《棋‧局》
25/11 (六) 晚上8時 關樂彤《指尖攻略》
26/11 (日) 下午3時 盧偉力《布萊希特x周恩來》
#每場演出完畢後均設座談會，歡迎觀眾留步參加   *部份演出含不雅用語或吸煙場面，敬請留意 *部份演出輔以普通話或英語，每場演出及詳情請參閱節目單張
有關詳情請參閱主辦機構之網站：www.prospectstheatre.com
event.desce:
In Cantonese
The annual meeting is here! This year marks the twelfth “Playwright Scheme” since it was launched in 2006. This year, Mr. Hardy Tsoi will bring together 10 playwrights to present 10 plays.
15/11 (Wed) 8pm Yu Chung Yin Sick Soak
16/11 (Thu) 8pm Buck Mok A King From Trees
17/11 (Fri) 8pm Chan Shu Fai Sky Trek
18/11 (Sat) 8pm Fung Kin Sun Gift from the Land
19/11 (Sun) 3pm Chan Wai Hung Look Up
22/11 (Wed) 8pm Tai Chun Fung Eternal Love
23/11 (Thu) 8pm Anna Wong The Way Home
24/11 (Fri) 8pm Au Sung Kei Kenny Generation
25/11 (Sat) 8pm Kwan Lok Tung Fingertips on the Raiders
26/11 (Sun) 3pm Dr. Lo Wai Luk Two Three Things About Brecht x Zhou En Lai
* With post performance talk after each performance. Audience are welcome to join. * Some performances contain coarse language or smoking scenes. * Some performances are performed in Cantonese with some Putonghua and English. Please refer to the programme leaflet for details of each performance.
event.remarkc: 遲到者須待適當時候方可進場。
event.remarke: Latecomers will only be admitted at a suitable break.
event.presenterorgc:
新域劇團主辦
鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署
event.presenterorge:
Presented by Prospects Theatre
Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 新域劇團《今晚救地球》
event.predateC: 2018年1月5-6日 (五至六) 晚上7時30分 2018年1月6-7日 (六至日) 下午2時30分
event.progtimec: 節目全長約2小時，包括中場休息10分鐘。
event.progtimee: Running time is about 2 hours with one intermission of 10 minutes.
event.agelimitc: 只限6歲或以上人士入場(本節目適合12歲或以上觀眾欣賞)
event.agelimite: Only for age 6 of above (This programme is suitable for ages 12 or above.)
event.descc:
粵語演出
全城唯一環保喜劇 編劇Hardy處男喜劇之作
環保份子Louise過著一個「零廢生活」，甚至不願意生小孩，以免浪費地球資源。他的同居男友Brandon卻希望結婚生子，讓母親抱孫，矛盾和笑料因此而生。
導演、編劇：蔡錫昌 顧問團：林超英、莊陳有、李偉才 特別客串： 陸恭蕙 演員：黃雋謙、陳樂珈、郭偉豪、陳慧仙、柳文興、彭萬龍、鄭丹屏、梅思源、黃劍冰、楊苑洪、張蕙嫺、杜施聰 (聲演) 佈景、燈光：李衛民 音響：楊我華 服裝：袁玉英 影像：莫耀華 平面：盧宇軒 監製：杜燕萍
每場設有演後座談會，歡迎觀眾留步參加。
有關詳情請參閱主辦機構之網站：www.prospectstheatre.com
event.desce:
In Cantonese
Louise is an environmentalist leading a zero-waste life style. Dedicated to her principle, she is ready to go as far as not having a child in her relationship with her partner Brandon. Brandon, on the contrary, wants to get married and have babies to please his mother. Lots of conflicts and laughter ensue.
Director / Playwright: Hardy Tsoi Advisors: Lam Chiu Ying, Chong Chan Yau, Eddy Lee Wai Choi Special Appearance: Christine Loh Actors: Bosco Wong, Lok-ka Anne Chan, Edmond Kwok, Chan Wai Sin, Victor Lau, Pang Man Lung, Cheng Dan Ping, Rosa Mui, Pansy Wong, Vivian Yeung, Vivian Cheung, Mac Tu (voice) Set / Lighting Designer: Priman Lee Sound Designer: Anthony Yeung Costume Designer: Shybil Yuen Projection Designer: Buck Mok Graphic Designer: Jo Lo Producer: Josephine To
With post-performance talk after each performance. Audience are welcome to join.
For details, please refer to the website of the presenter: www.prospectstheatre.com

event.titlec: 公眾節目：「觸 — 香港國際海報三年展2017」研討會
event.titlee: Public Programme: “Touch ― Hong Kong International Poster Triennial 2017” Symposium
event.descc: 香港文化博物館舉辦的「香港國際海報三年展」現已踏入第六屆，透過徵集、比賽，舉辦展覽和研討會，以擴闊和豐富博物館的海報收藏、促進國際間的文化交流，並展示不同地區的獨特文化和海報設計的特色。本屆三年展的研討會將於文化博物館舉行，講者包括知名設計師以及設計界的專業人士，藉此與公眾分享他們對現今與海報設計相關議題的看法，並探討未來海報設計的發展。此外，本屆海報三年展中的個別得奬者將分享他們獲獎作品的設計概念和內容。主持：許迅先生。講者：陳超宏先生、李永銓先生、盧永強先生。是次活動為「觸 — 香港國際海報三年展2017」展覽特備節目。
event.desce: The Hong Kong International Poster Triennial organised by Hong Kong Heritage Museum is now in its 6th edition. By calling for entries, and organising the associated competition, exhibition and symposium, the Museum aims to enrich its poster collection, foster international cultural exchange, and showcase features of unique cultures and poster designs from various parts of the world.A symposium for the current Poster Triennial will be held at the Hong Kong Heritage Museum, with renowned designers and professionals from the design industry sharing their views on the latest topics on poster design and exploring its future development. The individual award winners of the Poster Triennial 2017 will be invited to share the design concept and content of their awarded works. Moderator: Mr Eddy Hui. Speakers: Mr Eric Chan, Mr Tommy Li, Mr David Lo. In association with the exhibition “Touch ― Hong Kong International Poster Triennial 2017”.
event.remarkc: 名額320人，先到先得。報名請致電2180 8260或填寫教育及推廣活動報名表格（可於本館網址http://www.heritagemuseum.gov.hk 內「博物館節目」即時網上報名或下載報名表格）。已獲確認的報名人士可在研討會當天下午1時起，在博物館一樓劇院門外領取入場券。如於研討會開始後5分鐘仍未到達一樓劇院，已預留名額將開放予即場人士補替。本研討會設粵語、普通話、英語及日語即時傳譯服務。
event.remarke: A maximum of 320 participants on a first-come-first-served basis. To register, please call 2180 8260 or complete the application form for Education and Extension Programmes from the "Events and Activities" page at http://www.heritagemuseum.gov.hk, or apply on-line. Successful applicants can redeem their admission slips for the symposium at the distribution counter at the theatre entrance on the 1/F on the day of the symposium from 1pm onwards. Please arrive at the theatre on the 1/F no later than five minutes after the programme commences; otherwise, the reserved seats will be released to walk-in visitors waiting for admission. Simultaneous interpretation in Cantonese, Putonghua, English and Japanese will be provided.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署香港文化博物館
event.presenterorge: Hong Kong Heritage Museum, Leisure & Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「劇場‧再遇」系列：同流《拚死為出位》(三度公演)
event.titlee: Re-run Run Shows:We Draman Group – “Stones in His Pockets” (3rd Run)
event.predateC: 2018年1月11-14日 (四至日) 晚上8時 2018年1月13-14日 (六至日)下午3時
event.progtimec: 節目全長約2小時，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: Running time is about 2 hours without intermission.
event.descc:
粵語演出
兩位臨記電影演員，受僱到內地小鎮拍攝一齣大製作，小鎮內卻發生了一宗自殺事故，打亂了拍攝程序。兩位冇名冇利冇資產冇得輸的臨記為求出位，立即借題發揮就地取材更改劇本，表面上把悲傷化為喜劇，暗地裡將臨記變成主角！
人生，笑有出頭天。
兩名演員演活全劇15個角色，本劇曾在全球20多個國家上演，並翻譯成二十多種不同語言。倫敦郵報評本劇為「喜劇中的傑作！」每日郵報也稱讚本劇為「歡笑、愉悅、感動的作品！」
原著：Marie Jones 翻譯：張天恩 導演：鄧偉傑 演出：朱栢康、鄧智堅 佈景及服裝設計：孫詠君 燈光設計：賴詠珊 音響設計：陳詠杰
有關詳情請參閱主辦機構之網站：www.wedraman.com
event.desce:
In Cantonese
Two extras are hired to a small rural town in China to participate in a blockbuster movie production. During the time, a local teenager commits suicide, by drowning himself with stones in his pockets which disturbed the schedule of the filming. The two extras grasp this opportunity to make the extra becoming the lead! How could they turn the suicide into a happy ending?
The story is adapted from Stones in His Pockets by Marie Jones, originally happened in Ireland. The script calls upon the cast of two to perform all 15 characters. The play has been shown over 20 countries and translated into over 20 languages.
Playwright: Marie Jones Translator: Sarina Cheung Director: Tang Wai-kit Cast: Chu Pak-hong, Tang Chi-Kin Set & Costume Designer: Suen Wing-kwan Vanessa Lighting Designer: Lai Wing-shan Sound Designer: Chan Wing-kit
For details, please refer to the website of the presenter: www.wedraman.com

event.titlec: 「劇場‧再遇」系列：7A班戲劇組音樂劇《失戀，我們分手吧！》
event.titlee: Re-run Run Shows: Class 7A Drama Group – Musical "Love to Forget Rerun"
event.predateC: 2017年11月23月至25日 (星期四至六) 晚上7:45 2017年11月25日至26日 (星期六至日) 下午2:30
event.progtimec: 演出全長約3小時，包括一節中場休息。
event.progtimee: The running time of the performance is approximately 3 hours including one intermission.
event.descc:
粵語音樂劇附設英語字幕
嬉笑怒罵，笑談失戀，虔誠唔係大晒！
失戀，除了「日喊夜喊」，過程還可以相當「抵死」！某個他失戀後「逢人必溝」、失戀港女在Facebook假扮單身生活過得精彩、另一個就一廂情願以為虔誠情深就有回報……幾個失戀同路人互相嘲笑，甚至五十步笑百步，以嬉笑怒罵方式唱盡失戀時的荒唐行為！
幾個「因為某人而未能正常生活」（簡稱「失戀」）的人，成立了一個分享互助小組，希望互相扶持一起對付「失戀」這個大魔頭。然而，當他們逐一走過了「天天下雨」的日子之後，竟然發現原來自己之前的行為，相當「抵死」和「抵死」（兩個「抵死」分別指「自找」和「惹笑」）！
編劇／導演／填詞：一 休 作曲及音樂總監／填詞／演出：徐偉賢（第25屆香港舞台劇獎最佳原創曲詞） 演員：陳健豪、黃嘉威、楊麗詩、梁依倩、謝冰盈 歌唱指導：李頴康 聯合舞台設計：徐碩朋 聯合舞台設計／服裝設計：溫俊詩 燈光設計：陳佩儀 音響設計：黎智勇 編舞：翁麗華 英語字幕翻譯：鍾燕詩
event.desce:
Musical in Cantonese with English surtitle
Healing Musical with Best Original Music and Lyrics (25th Hong Kong Drama Awards) 
A few broken-hearted persons are gathered in a support group. Except crying day and night, they have decided to heal each other in different ways! One decides to flirt with each of the rest of the group, one considers Facebook a battlefield of love… Teasing, supporting and singing with the each other, they are slowly overcoming the downs. As they look back after moving on, we are going to realize all the silly or even ridiculous things they have done after a break up!
Playwright/Director/Lyrics：Yatyau (Leung Shing Him) Composer/Musical Director/Lyrics/Performer：Peco Chui Performers：Angus Chan, Wong Ka Wai, Jessie Yeung, Artemis Leung, Samantha Tse Singing Coach：Li Wing Hong Co-Set Design：Allan Tsui Co-Set Design /Costume / Image Design：Mable Wun Light Design： Claudia Chan Sound Design：Martin Lai Choreographer：Yung Lai Wah
event.remarkc: 遲到者須待適當時候方可進場。 11月25日下午2時30分的演出為「通達專場」，設有粵語口述影像，詳情請致電2777 1771與香港展能藝術會聯絡。

event.titlec: 「劇場‧再遇」系列：一條褲製作《父子母女一場……》(重演)
event.titlee: Re-run Run Shows: Pants Theatre Production - “My Dad, My Mom, My Son and My Daughter … “(Re-run)
event.predateC: 2017年12月8-10日 (五至日) 晚上8時 2017年12月9-10日 (六至日) 下午3時
event.progtimec: 節目全長約2小時30分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘。
event.progtimee: Running time is about 2 hours and 30 minutes including a 15-minute intermission.
event.descc:
粵語演出
父母子女，一場緣份，兩種關連。母女父子的關係，既尋常又充滿戲劇性，兩齣原創短劇同台探討當中微妙人情。
《目送背影》 今天香港，不少中年女性應付工作所需，終日奔波勞碌，又要兼顧婚姻及子女，還要照顧年邁父母，萬一父母身心出現問題，對她們來說，實在是多面受壓，可是她們的處境心聲往往不易表露。劇壇新晉龍偉潔以自己身為母親及女兒的親身經驗出發，加上親友經歷及其他真實故事，轉化成一齣三代母女的獨腳戲，伍潔茵獨挑大樑，演盡老中青三代女兒。 編劇：龍偉潔 導演：胡海輝 演出：伍潔茵
《我的父親・我的兒子》 有其父是否必有其子？建基於劇團專注發展的人種誌劇場，對兒子及父親進行深度訪談，收集真實材料，由新晉獲獎編劇鄭廸琪編撰成文本，四位年輕演員誠摯演繹，探討此時此地的父子關係。
編劇：鄭廸琪 導演：鄭傳軍# 演出：郭小杰、麥智樂、翁煒桐、嚴鉅乾 #承蒙香演藝學院批准參與演出
藝術總監：胡海輝 佈景及服裝設計：孫詠君 燈光設計：張素宜 音樂及音響設計：何子洋 錄像設計：方譯聲
有關詳情請參閱主辦機構之網站：www.pants.org.hk
event.desce:
In Cantonese
The relationship between parents and children is not only most common but also most complicated. These two original one-act plays explore the drama of this intricate relationship.
Farewell to the Receding Shadow Nowadays in Hong Kong, most women are torn between their work and her family. In the family, they have to take care of both their children and their parents, in addition to their husbands. They are pressed to make both ends meet but there is seldom a change to vent their feeling. Drawing from her own experiences as mother and daughter, and other true stories, new playwright Lung Wai-kit creates a touching solo drama about three generations of mothers and daughters, performed by Cecilia Ng.
Playwright: Lung Wai-kit Director: Wu Hoi-fai Performer: Cecilia Ng
Fantasia on Fathers and Sons Is it really like father, like son? This new documentary and ethnotheatre play captures real materials from interviews with fathers and sons, which are then transformed by award-winning playwright Callas Cheang to explore the multifaceted relationship between father and son. Playwright: Callas Cheang Director: Terence Chang# Performers: Kwok Siu-kit, Mak Chi Lok, Yung Wai-tung, Yim Kui-kin #With kind permission of the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts   Artistic Director: Wu Hoi-fai Set and Costume Designer: Vanessa Suen Lighting Designer: Zoe Cheung Sound Designer and Composer: Jacklam Ho Video Designer: Acid Fong
For details, please refer to the website of the presenter: www.pants.org.hk

event.titlec: 牽星過洋 ── 明代海貿傳奇
event.titlee: Sailing the Seven Seas: Legends of Maritime Trade of Ming Dynasty
event.descc: 展覽以航海為背景，輔以最新的水下考古發現 ── 「南澳 I 號」和「萬曆號」兩艘沉船的出水文物，以及在香港大嶼山竹篙灣和大埔碗窰出土的明代瓷器，探索這一時期海上貿易的發展。
event.desce: Set against the background of sea voyages and supported by the latest underwater archaeological discoveries, i.e. the artefacts recovered from the shipwrecks ‘Nan’ao I’ and ‘Wanli’, as well as Ming ceramics unearthed from Penny’s Bay in Lantau and Wun Yiu in Tai Po of Hong Kong, this exhibition explores the development of maritime trade during this period.

event.titlec: 沙田大會堂場地伙伴計劃：合家歡聖誕音樂劇《魔法豆腐花》(勇氣重演)
event.titlee: Sha Tin Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme: Magic Tofu Flower (Re-run)
event.descc: 粵語演出 近日全城都發惡夢，城內每一個人都睡得不好，這跟一個傳說有關。傳說中有 一位懂得巫術的巫婆叫麻婆，她最擅長煮麻婆豆腐，人們估計是麻婆拖展魔咒令到全城失眠。正義勇敢的良仔決意要救救發惡夢的人，於是逃出城市尋找傳說中的「魔法豆腐花」，傳聞只要找到魔法豆腐花，就可以為整個城市帶來美夢，究竟良仔會有什麼經歷？他能否找到這一朵「豆腐花」？  《魔法豆腐花》於2014年聖誕節首演12場反應熱烈，一票難求。今年，故事重新整理並加入新角色、音樂佈景燈光重新創作，帶領大家與劇中主角一起，再次尋找那豆腐造的花，展開全新的冒險之旅。  大小朋友請勿攜帶豆腐入場，以免給壞蛋施法，多謝合作！ 編劇：鄧智堅 導演：張銘耀 主要演員：歐珮瑩、馬嘉儀、曾慕雪、郭翠兒、林鎮威、陳瑋聰、郭俊傑
event.desce: In Cantonese
event.remarkc: 三角關係及一路青空為沙田大會堂場地伙伴

event.titlec: 上環文娛中心場地伙伴計劃 — 舞台劇《藝海唐生》
event.titlee: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Venue Partnership Scheme - Drama "THE POETRY JOURNEY OF TONG"
event.descc: 中國近代最才華洋溢粵劇編劇家唐滌生的傳奇故事：阿唐勤於筆耕，嶄露頭角，其後一紙風行，人人爭相邀筆，阿唐不屑抱殘守缺，決意創新粵劇，引來同業前輩非議。但阿唐特立獨行，堅守信念，終與任、白、波合作無間，創粵劇新象，榮登殿堂，成劇壇瑰寶。
event.desce: Please refer to Chinese version for programme description.

event.titlec: 上環文娛中心場地伙伴計劃 — 舞台劇《七級豬集團》
event.titlee: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Venue Partnership Scheme - Drama "Pig Pile"
event.predateC: 2018年3月23至24日 (星期五至六) 晚上8:00; 2018年3月24至25日 (星期六至日) 下午3:00
event.descc: 《七級豬集團》由榮獲「港舞台劇獎 — 最佳劇本」及六度提名香港舞台劇獎及香港小劇場獎「最佳劇本」的劉浩翔編寫。以啜核抵死的對白、荒謬而「貼地」的情節，為一至七級豬重新定位！「七級豬」是一個隔絕溝通的遊戲，若在現實生活中進行，又會是怎樣的一個世界？抑或在信任崩壞的都市中，遊戲已在你我間靜靜開始……一群「七級豬」集結在一起，是生活中的失敗者，還是遇上志同道合的伙伴？
event.desce: Please refer to Chinese version for programme description.
event.presenterorgc: iStage主辦； 節目由康樂及文化事務署贊助； 劇道場及iStage為上環文娛中心場地伙伴
event.presenterorge: Presented by iStage；Sponsored by the Leisure and Cultural Services Department；Theatre Dojo and iStage are the Venue Partners of Sheung Wan Civic Centre

event.titlec: 上環文娛中心場地伙伴計劃 — 舞台劇《聖誕老人玩轉聖誕假》
event.titlee: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Venue Partnership Scheme - Drama "Santa Claus Is Out Of Town"
event.descc: 繼《走音大聯萌》、《老友大逃亡》後，鄭至芝再度率領一眾小演員炮製一個充滿溫馨與笑聲的舞台劇：眼見世人只懂消費節日，忘卻節日的真正意義，節日聯盟會長聖誕老人意興闌珊，毅然決定退休。為了補償過去五百年的年中無休，他決定環遊世界，享受人生，卻意外來到香港，遇上嗜財如命的朱氏一家。朱氏一家為了挽救投資失利的家族生意，本欲利誘大陸來港的表叔入股。誤打誤撞下，朱氏一家把聖誕老人誤認成多年不見的表叔，接回了三百呎的豪宅款待。但這次「亂哂龍」的邂逅，正好讓每一個人重拾節日的真諦。
event.desce: Please refer to Chinese version for programme description.

event.titlec: 天象節目《夢幻極光》
event.descc: 天象節目《夢幻極光》利用縮時攝影捕捉極光的千姿百態，再重現在球幕之上。電腦動畫清楚展示極光產生的機制；再配合冰川航拍片段、壯麗的極地影像和優美的新世紀音樂，讓觀眾暫時忘卻繁囂，融入天地之間，享受球幕下獨有的極光體驗。
event.desce: In the Sky Show "KAGAYA's Aurora", different auroras captured by time-lapse photography are recreated under the dome. The mechanism of the formation of an aurora is also vividly illustrated by using computer graphics. With aerial shots of glaciers, grand images of the Arctic and melodious New Age Music, audience can step out of their busy lives for a while, connect themselves to nature and experience the aurora in a unique, planetarium way.
event.remarkc: 平日：下午3時50分及7時20分星期六、日及公眾假期：下午12時20分、3時50分及7時20分(星期一及四晚上7時20分場次為英語旁述)
event.remarke: Weekdays: 3:50pm and 7:20pmSat, Sun and public holidays: 12:20pm, 3:50pm and 7:20pm(Mon and Thu 7:20pm shows are in English narration)

event.titlec: 火花！新遊社：文創導賞員@社區
event.titlee: Sparkle! Neo Travel: Creative and Cultural Docent@ Community
event.descc: 導賞並不一定是展覽的附屬品，在不少展覽中，導賞員猶如一位小策展人，對展品進行演繹。走進這個特別的「旅行社」，導賞將化身為主角，展覽精選了數個與文化和創意相關的代表性導賞遊案例，通過展示它們的資料，並於展覽期間舉行導賞遊，呈現導賞員在設計和帶領導賞遊中的創意、文化使命和策動力，同時亦讓觀眾透過文化導賞團，親身體會和參與，走進社區看藝術、聽故事。
event.desce: Docent services are not only accessories of exhibitions, in many occasions, docents serve as secondary curators re-interpreting the exhibits. In this special "travel agency", docents will become the protagonists. By displaying information about several representatives of creative and cultural related docent tours we have selected, together with free guided tours during the exhibition period [...]
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 火花！只是看書
event.descc: 受「一冊、一室」的啟發，油街實現的展廳將化身為五本書的載體，以展覽空間結合視覺藝術呈現書籍的思想內容。本展覽特意撰寫五本書籍，以不同角度發掘「家」的主題，探索「根」、「血脈」、「流動」等觀念。展覽將分為五期，每期只集中展現一本書籍，並突破傳統書籍文本閱讀的界限，以視覺藝術方式呈現文學，為讀者提供不一樣的閱讀及觀展經驗。
event.desce: The exhibition consists of five consecutive sessions, presenting one book at a time using artistic visualisation and interdisciplinary approach, liberating readers from a traditional reading medium. The purpose is to draw visitors' full attention on a single book and allure visitors to enjoy an unprecedented and delightful viewing experience.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 室內歌劇：徐訏《鬼戀》講座系列
event.titlee: Talk Series on Chamber Opera: Xu Xu’s Ghost Love
event.progtimec: 每場講座長約1小時30分鐘。
event.progtimee: Each talk will run for about 1 hour and 30minutes.
event.pricec: 免費入場，座位有限，先到先得。
event.pricee: Free admission in a first-come-first-served basis.
event.descc:
一連三場講座，由室內歌劇：徐訏《鬼戀》的作曲家陳慶恩、舞台及服裝設計師陳志權、劇作家意珩與主持鄭政恆，與你細味音樂、舞台、文字創作的意像江河。粵語主講，免費入場。
講座一：《創作華語歌劇：以《鬼戀》為例》 歌劇不單要讓音樂推進劇情，發揮歌者的美聲，還得照顧到語言的特色。創作華語歌劇是橫的移植，而非縱的繼承，可供參考的成功作品著實不多，作曲家都是摸著石頭過河，各自從創作中累積經驗。陳慶恩將以《鬼戀》為例，分享他對創作華語歌劇的一些看法。
講座二：《從文字到視覺的呈現》 文字是一個遼闊的想像空間，作者在文字中表達個人的思緒，讀者從文字中領會情懷。這之間存在著千絲萬縷的關係，既是感情的接收，又是理性的傳遞，也可產生影像聯想。而舞台設計師就是視像的演繹者，從文本的明示或暗示感應視覺元素，轉化成三維空間，勾畫人與物的造型，使其跳出文本，呈現於人前。
講座三：《最顯而易見的審美》 徐訏是上世紀的文學作家，曾經在香港留下很多文字作品，其中包括動人的詩句、折射心境的諷刺、殘缺或趨近完美的故事。他的小說《鬼戀》曾被不同的時代和藝術形式演繹，從小說的文字，到上世紀90年代畫家陳逸飛導演建構的電影，到當下年輕劇作家意珩重新創作的歌劇文本，每一次形式的改變，都意味著藝術審美的再次提煉。
event.desce: A Series of three talks in which the composer Chan Hing-yan, set and costume designer Ricky Chan, script writer/ librettist Yi Heng and moderator Matthew Cheng will discuss in depth about the creation process of the Chamber Opera: Xu Xu's "Ghost Love" in respect of the music, stage set and libretto.   All three talks will be conducted in Cantonese.  For details, please refer to the Chinese version.

event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 穿‧越‧時代：旗袍篇
event.titlee: The Stars, the Silver Screen and the Qipao
event.descc: 展出二十四套從1949至2001年的旗袍戲服，重現民初至六十年代的人文風景，部分黑白電影中女星如周璇、白光、李香蘭（即山口淑子）、李麗華、林黛、樂蒂等穿著過的旗袍，亦將首次還其「本色」！
event.desce: 24 qipao costumes of films from 1949-2001 on display, bringing you on a cultural journey through early Republic years to 1960s. Some once worn by stars such as Zhou Xuan, Bai Guang, Li Xianglan (aka Shirley Yamaguchi Yoshiko), Li Lihua, Linda Lin Dai and Betty Loh Ti in the early black and white films are resumed to their full coloured glory for the first time!

event.titlec: 浪人劇場《棒球場上的亞熱帶少年》
event.predateC: 2017年12月1日至2日 (星期五至六) 晚上8:00 2017年12月3日 (星期日) 下午3:00
event.progtimec: 演出全長約2小時30分鐘，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The running time of the performance is approximately 2 hours and 30 minutes without intermission.
event.descc:
粵語演出 青年們墜落在舊工業大廈貨倉內，想起 1881年站在舊金山棒球場上遙望著太平洋的亞熱帶少年， 少年的際遇化為青年們霓幻夢話， 建構成殖民地時期的香港大老－周壽臣。
年少的他沒有選擇的權利，去和留，都不由自己， 但他的名字留下，在山巒、在街道、在劇院。
亞熱帶少年的黑眼晴，在東方之珠的黑夜中仍閃爍可見， 青年們提醒自己不能再喃喃夢話，卻要在狂言亂語中直面人的良知。
歷史在圓的時間流動……
演出以鄭宏泰、周振威合著的《香港大老─周壽臣》進行改編，配合現場音樂及實時攝錄，以浪人劇場獨幟一格的當代劇場語言，敍述香港首位華人行政局議員周壽臣（1861-1959）的傳奇。
event.desce: In Cantonese Adapted from the book “Grand Old Man ofHong Kong: Sir Shouson Chow” by Dr. Victor Zheng and Charles W. Chow.  Incorporating live music and real-time recording, with the contemporarytheatrical language, Theatre Ronin illustrates the legendary life of the veryfirst Chinese member of the Executive Council -- Sir Shouson Chow (1861-1959).
event.remarkc: 本節目含暴力場面。 遲到者須待節目適當時候方可進場。
event.remarke: This programme contains violent scenes. Latecomers will only be admitted at a suitable break.
event.presenterorgc:
浪人劇場主辦
鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署
event.presenterorge:
Presented by Theatre Ronin
Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 劇場空間《主席萬歲》
event.predateC: 2018年1月18日至20日 (星期四至六) 晚上8:00 2018年1月20日至21日 (星期六至日) 下午3:00
event.progtimec: 演出全長約2小時，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The running time of the performance is approximately 2 hours without intermission.
event.descc: 粵語演出 劇場空間20周年 革命鉅獻 真的假不了 假的不得了 陳志雲、倪秉郎攜手出征 張飛帆、余振球聯合炮製 甘草演員陳四茂（陳志雲飾）與白俊奇（倪秉郎飾）經歷過港產片的盛衰。 一套中港合拍革命大片開拍在即，白俊奇臨時拉伕找來陳四茂北上客串，誰知扮演毛主席的知名演員突然暴斃，導演無計可施，竟以陳四茂來頂替。誰知陳四茂由於太過神似，竟惹來村民狂熱崇拜，誤打誤撞間更解決了村裏無數問題，讓這位名不經傳的小人物一夜成名。電影投資者欲借陳四茂圖利，事情更惹來政府部門的關注。 現實與荒誕縱橫交織，陳四茂與白俊奇周旋在無數「真」與「假」的矛盾之中，走向一個疑幻疑真的電影夢、中國夢。
event.desce: In Cantonese TheatreSpace 20th Anniversary Proudly Presents “Long Live Chairman”by Cheung Fei Fan StarringStephen Chan and Simon Ngan Directedby Jacob Yu
event.remarkc: 本節目含不雅用語。遲到者須待節目適當時候方可進場。
event.remarke: This programme contains coarse language. Latecomers will only be admitted at a suitable break.
event.presenterorgc:
劇場空間主辦
鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署
event.presenterorge:
Presented by Theatre Space
Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：普 劇場－《I Ought To Be In Pictures》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme:"I Ought To Be In Pictures" by POP Theatre
event.descc:
從台北九份直奔香港屯門的台灣通靈少女，說出口的理由是暫借棲身之地，在號稱時尚都會的香港發展模特兒事業；內心其實是希望尋回消失了十六年的父親身影，和找出他當年不辭而別的因由！怎知卻意外發現父親攝影事業的困境，及跟同居大陸女友若即若離的關係危機。這不請自來的女兒會是爸爸的拯救者還是终極破壞王？
用紐西蒙的劇本和原裝附送的美式幽默對白，細說一段港、台失敗婚姻下的父女關係。
原著：Neil Simon 導演：劉錫賢 翻譯及改編：司徒偉健

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：普 劇場－合家歡音樂劇《貝貝的文字冒險》2017弦樂篇
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme:"The Writing Adventure of Bui Bui" the Musical by POP Theatre
event.descc:
初中女生貝貝熱愛繪畫，但卻討厭文字。一天接過神秘電郵之後，竟落入由文字魔法師黑騎士統領的符號王國！自命邪惡的黑騎士給貝貝開出一道又一道寫作難題，貝貝必須發揮想像力和創意，寫出令黑騎士滿意的文章才有望回家！
導演：陳永泉 音樂總監：黃旨穎

監製／藝術總監：高志森 導演：余健生 總策劃：林靜影 執行監製：陳紀均 主要演員：林玉盈、梁穎智、馮志坤、顏俊豪、葉嘉茵、鄧捷銳

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：春天實驗劇團—爆笑音樂劇《情場如戰場》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme: "The Battle of Love" the Musical by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $220, 180, 140 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $220, 180, 140 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc:
原著：張愛玲 監製 / 導演 / 藝術總監：高志森 聯合導演：李潤祺 總策劃：林靜影 執行監製：陳紀均
主要演員：黃榮杰、張加慧、張家銘、隆藹宜
勁歌熱舞，唱盡寶島金曲！
故事人物都「喜劇」得很：姐姐美艷開朗，擅交際，在情場之中無往不利，但卻一直無法「攻陷」優柔木納的文人表哥。和姐姐的浮誇相反，妹妹表面實實在在，其實騷在骨子裡，不但有小姐脾氣，更愛上正在追求姐姐愛充闊的小白領。為了氣表哥，姐姐故意熱烈「追求」不解風情的胖教授，誰料胖教授認真得向姐姐求婚，引致五角戀愛糾纏不清，笑話連篇！
《情場如戰場》中張愛玲用喜劇的筆觸辛辣地諷刺中國人模稜兩可、陽奉陰違的性格。他們渴望去愛與被愛，但道德包袱過重，壓抑過甚，面對愛的對象時不懂怎樣愛；不是操之過急，就是不敢表態，甚至是反複地自我蒙騙。
爆笑音樂劇《情場如戰場》將故事背景改為令人着迷的七十年代，貫串大量當年寶島經典金曲，歌舞連場，目不暇給。
